original: Larger Prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: largeḥ prajñāpāramitā

original: (LPG 1r) siddhaṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasamaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati

original: sma gṛdhrākūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paṃcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ
analyzed: sma gṛdhrākūṭa parvate mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham paṃca mātraiḥ bhikṣu sahasraiḥ

original: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
analyzed: sarvaiḥ arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇa āsravaiḥ niṣkleśaiḥ vaśībhūtaiḥ su vimukta cittaiḥ su vimukta prajñaiḥ

original: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ
analyzed: ājāneyaiḥ mahā nāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛta karaṇīyaiḥ apahṛta bhāraiḥ anuprāpta svaka arthaiḥ

original: parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśitāparamapāramiprāptair
analyzed: parikṣīṇa bhava saṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñā su vimukta cittaiḥ sarva cetaḥ vaśitā parama pārami prāptaiḥ

original: ekapudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yad utāyuṣmantam ānandam* śaikṣaṃ srotāpannaṃ paṃcamātraiś
analyzed: eka pudgalam sthāpayitvā yat uta āyuṣmantam ānandam śaikṣam srotāpannam paṃca mātraiḥ

original: ca bhikṣuṇīśatair yaśodharāmahāprajāpatīpramukhaiḥ saṃbahulaiś copāsakair upāsikābhiś
analyzed: ca bhikṣuṇī śataiḥ yaśodharā mahāprajāpatī pramukhaiḥ saṃbahulaiḥ ca upāsakaiḥ upāsikābhiḥ

original: ca sarvair dṛṣṭadharmabhiḥ mahatā ca bodhisatvasaṃghena sārdham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyair
analyzed: ca sarvaiḥ dṛṣṭadharmabhiḥ mahatā ca bodhisatva saṃghena sārdham aprameya asaṃkhyeyaiḥ

original: bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ samādhipratilabdhaiḥ śunyatāvihāribhir
analyzed: bodhisatvaiḥ mahāsatvaiḥ sarvaiḥ dhāraṇī pratilabdhaiḥ samādhi pratilabdhaiḥ śunyatā vihāribhiḥ

original: ānimittagocarair akalpitapraṇidhānaiḥ sarvadharmasamatākṣāntipratilabdhaiḥ asaṃgapraṇidhānasamanvāgataiḥ
analyzed: ā nimitta gocaraiḥ a kalpita praṇidhānaiḥ sarva dharma samatā kṣānti pratilabdhaiḥ asaṃga praṇidhāna samanvāgataiḥ

original: akṣayanirdeśapratisaṃvinnayapratividdhaiḥ mahābhijñāvikrīḍitair atyantācyutābhijñair
analyzed: akṣaya nirdeśa pratisaṃvid naya pratividdhaiḥ mahā abhijñā vikrīḍitaiḥ atyanta acyuta abhijñaiḥ

original: ādeyavacanair akusīdair ārabdhavīryaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣair akuhakair alapakair
analyzed: ādeya vacanaiḥ akusīdaiḥ ārabdha vīryaiḥ kāya jīvita nirapekṣaiḥ a kuhakaiḥ a lapakaiḥ

original: apagatajñātilābhacittair nirāmiṣadharmadeśakaiḥ gaṃbhīradharmakṣāntiparamagatiṃgataiḥ
analyzed: apagata jñāti lābha cittaiḥ nirāmiṣa dharma deśakaiḥ gaṃbhīra dharma kṣānti parama gatiṃgataiḥ

original: mahāvaiśāradyaprāptaiḥ asaṃkucitamānasaiḥ sarvamārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ karmāvaraṇapratiprasrabdhaiḥ
analyzed: mahā vaiśāradya prāptaiḥ asaṃkucita mānasaiḥ sarva māra karma samatikrāntaiḥ karma āvaraṇa pratiprasrabdhaiḥ

original: nihatakarmakleśapratyarthikaiḥ sarvaparapravādyanabhibhūtaiḥ (LPG 1v)
analyzed: nihata karma kleśa pratyarthika sarva para pravādin anabhibhūta

original: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaduravagāhair dharmapravicayavibhaktinirdeśakuśalaiḥ asaṃkhyeyakalpasusamārabdhapraṇidhānaiḥ
analyzed: sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha duravagāhaiḥ dharma pravicaya vibhakti nirdeśa kuśalaiḥ asaṃkhyeya kalpa su samārabdha praṇidhānaiḥ

original: smitamukhaiḥ pūrvālāpibhiḥ vyapagatabhrukuṭikaiḥ ślakṣṇamadhuvacanaiḥ gāthābhigītaparālapanakuśalaiḥ
analyzed: smita mukhaiḥ pūrva ālāpibhiḥ vyapagata bhrukuṭikaiḥ ślakṣṇa madhu vacanaiḥ gāthā abhigīta para ālapana kuśalaiḥ

original: anācchedyapratibhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanair vaiśāradyasamanvāgatair anantakalpakoṭīnirdeśajñānaniḥsaraṇakuśalaiḥ
analyzed: an ācchedya pratibhānaiḥ ananta parṣad abhibhavanaiḥ vaiśāradya samanvāgataiḥ ananta kalpa koṭī nirdeśa jñāna niḥsaraṇa kuśalaiḥ

original: māyāmarīcidagacandrasvapnapratiśrutkapratibhāsagaganagandharvanagarapratibiṃbanirmāṇopamadharmādhimuktair
analyzed: māyā marīci daga candra svapna pratiśrutka pratibhāsa gagana gandharvanagara pratibiṃba nirmāṇa upama dharma adhimuktaiḥ

original: apagatasaṃlīnacittaiḥ sarvasatvacittagatisūkṣmajñānacaryādhimuktyavatārakuśalaiḥ
analyzed: apagata saṃlīna cittaiḥ sarva satva citta gati sūkṣma jñāna caryā adhimukti avatāra kuśalaiḥ

original: sarvasatvāpratihatacittair adhimātrakṣāntisamanvāgataiḥ sarvadharmatāprativedhajñānakuśalair
analyzed: sarva satva apratihata cittaiḥ adhimātra kṣānti samanvāgataiḥ sarva dharmatā prativedha jñāna kuśalaiḥ

original: gaṃbhīradharmatāduravagāhaiḥ svacittavaśitāpratilabdhaiḥ sarvavaśitāprāptaiḥ sarvakarmakleśadṛṣṭyāvaraṇavimuktaiḥ
analyzed: gaṃbhīra dharmatā duravagāhaiḥ sva citta vaśitā pratilabdhaiḥ sarva vaśitā prāptaiḥ sarva karma kleśa dṛṣṭi āvaraṇa vimuktaiḥ

original: pratītyanirdeśakuśalair gaṃbhīrapratītyasamutpādākṣayanayāvatīrṇaiḥ sarvadṛṣṭyanuśayaparyutthānavigataiḥ
analyzed: pratītya nirdeśa kuśalaiḥ gaṃbhīra pratītyasamutpāda akṣaya naya avatīrṇaiḥ sarva dṛṣṭi anuśaya paryutthāna vigataiḥ

original: sarvasaṃyojanaprahīṇaiḥ satyaprativedhajñānakuśalaiḥ satatasamitapratiśrutkāsamasarvadharmādhimuktaiḥ
analyzed: sarva saṃyojana prahīṇaiḥ satya prativedha jñāna kuśalaiḥ satata samita pratiśrutkā sama sarva dharma adhimuktaiḥ

original: apramāṇadharmanayanirdeśaviśāradair yathātmyāvatāraṇakuśalair anantabuddhakṣetravyūhapraṇidhānaprasthānaparigṛhītair
analyzed: apramāṇa dharma naya nirdeśa viśāradaiḥ yathātmya avatāraṇa kuśalaiḥ ananta buddhakṣetra vyūha praṇidhāna prasthāna parigṛhītaiḥ

original: asaṃkhyeyalokadhātugatabuddhānusmṛtisamādhisatatasamitam abhimukhībhūtaiḥ sarvabuddhotpādopasaṃkramaṇakuśalair
analyzed: asaṃkhyeya lokadhātu gata buddha anusmṛti samādhi satata samitam abhimukhībhūtaiḥ sarva buddha utpāda upasaṃkramaṇa kuśalaiḥ

original: aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalair nānādṛṣṭiparyutthānasatvakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ samādhiśatasahasrābhinirhāraniṣkrīḍanajñānapraveśakuśalair
analyzed: aparimita buddha adhyeṣaṇa kuśalaiḥ nānā dṛṣṭi paryutthāna satva kleśa praśamana kuśalaiḥ samādhi śata sahasra abhinirhāra niṣkrīḍana jñāna praveśa kuśalaiḥ

analyzed: vyavalokya sarva kāyāt prabhām prāmuñcat tasya adhastāt pada talayoḥ sahasra ārābhyām cakrābhyām ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭi raśmi koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi niścaranti sma

original: daśabhyaś ca pādāṃgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /

original: evaṃ dvābhyāṃ gulphābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jaṃghābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyām*

original: kaṭer nābhimaṇḍalāt* dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyām* hṛdaye śrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt* saṣṭiṣaṣṭī

original: daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaraṃti sma /

original: evan dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyām* dvābhyām āṃsābhyām* grīvāyāś catasṛbhyo (LPG 2v)

original: daṃṣṭrābhyaś catvāriṃśato dantebhyaḥ dvābhyāṃ cakṣubhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyām* dvābhyāṃ

original: ghrāṇapuṭebhyām* madhye bhruvorṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt* mukhadvārāc ca ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī
analyzed: ghrāṇa puṭebhyām madhye bhruvā ūrṇāyāḥ upariṣṭāt uṣṇīṣāt mukha dvārāt ca ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭī

original: lokadhātuṃ mahatāvabhāsena spharitvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
analyzed: lokadhātum mahatā avabhāsena spharitvā pūrvasyām diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn

original: mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
analyzed: mahatā avabhāsena spharanti sma

original: evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samaṃtād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /

original: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tena raśmyavabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: yaiḥ ca satvaiḥ saḥ vabhāsaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ye ca tena raśmi avabhāsena spṛṣṭāḥ te sarve niyatāḥ abhavan anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro
analyzed: atha bhagavān punar eva sarva romakūpebhyaḥ prabhām prāmuṃcat yayā prabhayā ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ

original: lokadhātur mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt* pūrvasyāṃ ca diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo
analyzed: lokadhātuḥ mahatā avabhāsena sphuṭaḥ bhūt pūrvasyām ca diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān

original: mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
analyzed: mahatā avabhāsena sphuṭāḥ abhūvan evam diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt

analyzed: upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātavaḥ

analyzed: mahatā avabhāsena sphuṭāḥ abhūvan yaiḥ ca satvaiḥ saḥ vabhāsaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ye ca tena avabhāsena

original: spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: spṛṣṭāḥ te sarve niyatāḥ abhavan anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
analyzed: pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn mahatā avabhāsena spharati sma

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātuṃs tena mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
analyzed: evam diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātun tena mahatā avabhāsena spharati sma

original: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: yaiḥ ca satvaiḥ saḥ vabhāsaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ye ca tena avabhāsena spṛṣṭāḥ te sarve niyatāḥ abhavan anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha bhagavān mukhadvārāj jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya sarvāvantam imaṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
analyzed: atha bhagavān mukha dvārāt jihvā indriyam nirṇamayya sarvāvantam imam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram

original: lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa spharitvā smitaṃ prādurakārṣīt* tataś ca jihvendriyād anekāni
analyzed: lokadhātum jihvā indriyeṇa spharitvā smitam prādurakārṣīt tatas ca jihvā indriyāt anekāni

original: nānāvarṇāni raśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
analyzed: nānā varṇāni raśmi koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi niścaranti sma

original: sarvatra ca raśmyāṃ nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni santiṣṭhante sma /
analyzed: sarvatra ca raśmyām nānā ratna mayāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni santiṣṭhante sma

original: citrāṇi darśanīyāni manoramāṇi /
analyzed: citrāṇi darśanīyāni manoramāṇi

original: suvarṇāni sugandhīni /
analyzed: suvarṇāni sugandhīni

original: mṛdūni kācalindikasukhasaṃsparśāni /
analyzed: mṛdūni kāca lindika sukha saṃsparśāni

original: tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgatavigrahā niṣaṇṇā dharman deśayaṃti sma /
analyzed: tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgata vigrahāḥ niṣaṇṇāḥ dharman deśayaṃti sma

original: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanāṃ te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn gacchanti sma /
analyzed: yat uta imām eva ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktān dharma deśanām te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn gacchanti sma

original: tatra gatvā dharman deśayaṃti sma /
analyzed: tatra gatvā dharman deśayaṃti sma

original: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām
analyzed: yat uta imām eva ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktān dharma deśanām evam diśi paścimāyām

original: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
analyzed: uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamāl

original: lokadhātūn gacchanti sma /
analyzed: lokadhātūn gacchanti sma

original: tatra gatvā dharman deśayanti sma /
analyzed: tatra gatvā dharman deśayanti sma

original: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* yaiś ca satvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
analyzed: yat uta imām eva ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktān dharma deśanām yaiḥ ca satvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ te sarve niyatāḥ abhavan anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma buddhasamādhiṃ samāpadya tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma
analyzed: atha bhagavān tasmin eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitam nāma buddha samādhim samāpadya tathārūpam ṛddhi abhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma

original: yathārūpeṇardhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ (LPG 3v)
analyzed: yathārūpeṇa ṛdhi abhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ v

original: ṣaḍvikāram akaṃpata prākaṃpata saṃprākaṃpata /
analyzed: ṣaṣ vikāram akaṃpata prākaṃpata saṃprākaṃpata

original: avedhat* prāvedhat* saṃprāvedhat* acalat prācalat saṃprācalat* akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat
analyzed: avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat acalat prācalat saṃprācalat akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat

original: saṃprākṣubhyat* agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat* araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat* anteṣūnnamati sma /
analyzed: saṃprākṣubhyat agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat anteṣu unnamati sma

original: madhye 'vanamati sma /
analyzed: madhye vanamati sma

original: madhya aunnamati smānteṣv avanamati sma / mṛdukaḥ
analyzed: madhye sma anteṣu avanamati sma mṛdukaḥ

analyzed: snigdhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sarva sukha saṃjananaḥ bhūt atha tena kṣaṇa lava muhūrtena yāvantaḥ

original: 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau narakatiryagyoniyamalokākṣaṇāpāyadurgativinipātās
analyzed: smin tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau naraka tiryagyoni yama loka akṣaṇa apāya durgati vinipātāḥ

original: te sarve samucchinnā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapannā
analyzed: te sarve samucchinnāḥ abhūvan sarve ca te satvāḥ manuṣyāṇām sabhāga tāyai upapannā

original: abhūvan* cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ ca devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ
analyzed: abhūvan cāturmahārājakāyikānām ca devānām trāyastriṃśānām yāmānām tuṣitānām nirmāṇaratīnām

original: paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapannā abhūvan* atha te manuṣyās
analyzed: paranirmitavaśavartinām devānām sahabhāga tāyai upapannāḥ abhūvan atha te manuṣyāḥ

original: te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
analyzed: te ca devāḥ tena eva prīti prasāda prāmodyena paurvikīm jātim samanusmaraṃti sma

original: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtā bhagavantaṃ namasyanti sma /
analyzed: samanusmṛtya prīti prasāda prāmodya pratilabdhāḥ yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ upasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtāḥ bhagavantam namasyanti sma

original: evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
analyzed: evam diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām

original: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukāsameṣu
analyzed: adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā sameṣu

analyzed: lokadhātuṣu sarva narakāḥ sarva tiryagyonayaḥ sarva yamalokā samucchinnāḥ sarva akṣaṇāḥ

original: cāstamitā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapadyante sma /
analyzed: ca astamitāḥ abhūvan sarve ca te satvāḥ manuṣyāṇām sahabhāga tāyai upapadyante sma

original: atha te manuṣyās te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
analyzed: atha te manuṣyāḥ te ca devāḥ tena eva prīti prasāda prāmodyena paurvikīm jātim samanusmaraṃti sma

original: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra
analyzed: samanusmṛtya prīti prasāda prāmodya pratilabdhāḥ svaka svakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra

original: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti tān upasaṃkramanti smopasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtās
analyzed: tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti tān upasaṃkramanti sma upasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtāḥ

original: tāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān namasyanti sma /
analyzed: tān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān namasyanti sma

original: atha tena kṣaṇena ye 'smiṃs (LPG 4r)
analyzed: atha tena kṣaṇena ye smin

original: vadhirā śrotreṇa śabdāṃc chṛṇvanti sma /
analyzed: vadhirā śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇvanti sma

original: unmattā smṛtiṃ pratilabhaṃti sma /
analyzed: unmattā smṛtim pratilabhaṃti sma

original: vikṣiptacittā avikṣiptacittatāṃ pratilabhante sma /
analyzed: vikṣipta cittāḥ a vikṣipta citta tām pratilabhante sma

original: nagnāś cīvarāṇi pratilabhante sma /
analyzed: nagnāḥ cīvarāṇi pratilabhante sma

original: daridrā dhanāni pratilabhante sma /
analyzed: daridrāḥ dhanāni pratilabhante sma

original: jighatsitā bhojanāni pratilabhante sma /
analyzed: jighatsitāḥ bhojanāni pratilabhante sma

analyzed: pipāsitāḥ pānīyam pratilabhante sma

analyzed: roga spṛṣṭāḥ vigata rogāḥ abhūvan vikala indriyāḥ paripūrṇa indriyāḥ abhūvan klānta kāyā

analyzed: a klānta kāyāḥ abhūvan avirahita akuśala kāya vāc manaḥ karmanta ājīvāḥ vigata akuśala kāya vāc manaḥ karmanta ājīvāḥ bhavanti sma

original: sarvasatvāś ca sarvasatveṣu samacittā abhūvan* yad uta mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginīsamacittāḥ
analyzed: sarva satvāḥ ca sarva satveṣu sama cittāḥ abhūvan yat uta mātā pitṛ bhrātṛ bhaginī sama cittāḥ

original: mitrajñātisahāyasamacittāḥ sarvasatvā daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatā abhūvan* brahmacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: mitra jñāti sahāya sama cittāḥ sarva satvāḥ daśa kuśala karma patha samanvāgatāḥ abhūvan brahmacāriṇaḥ

analyzed: śucayaḥ nirāma gandhāḥ sarva akuśala vitarka vigatāḥ sarva satvāḥ tasmin samaye sarva sukha samarpitā

analyzed: abhūvan evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samanvāgatāḥ tat yathā tṛtīya dhyāna samāpannasya bhikṣoḥ

analyzed: sukham sarva satvāḥ ca tasmin samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatāḥ abhūvan yat evam jānaṃti sma

original: sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu satyam /
analyzed: sādhu dānam sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu satyam

analyzed: sādhu apramādaḥ sādhu maitrī sādhu karuṇā sādhu avihiṃsā prāṇi bhūteṣu

original: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
analyzed: atha bhagavān tasmin eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ imam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum

original: sasumeruṃ sacakravāḍaṃ sadevabhavanaṃ sendrakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ savaśavartinaṃ saśuddhāvāsaṃ
analyzed: sa sumerum sa cakravāḍam sa deva bhavanam sa indrakam sa brahmakam sa vaśavartinam sa śuddhāvāsam

original: sadevadānavakāyam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
analyzed: sa deva dānava kāyam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā

original: tadyathāpi nāma balavān divākaraḥ pariśuddhe gaganatale paurṇamāsyāṃ vā candramaṇḍalam*
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma balavān divākaraḥ pariśuddhe gagana tale paurṇamāsyām vā candra maṇḍalam

original: evam eva bhagavān pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya dakṣiṇasyāṃ
analyzed: evam eva bhagavān pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya dakṣiṇasyām

original: paścimāyām uttarasyām (LPG 4v)
analyzed: paścimāyām uttarasyām lpg

original: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya
analyzed: adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya

analyzed: sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śriyā tat yathā api nāma

original: sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvāṃs tadanyān parvatān abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate /
analyzed: sumeruḥ parvata rājaḥ sarvān tad anyān parvatān abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate

original: tadyathāpi nāma candramaṇḍalam* sarvāṇi tārārūpāṇy abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsati tapati virocate /
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma candra maṇḍalam sarvāṇi tārā rūpāṇi abhibhūya sthitam śobhate bhāsati tapati virocate

original: tadyathāpi nāma sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvāṃs tadanyān avabhāsān abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /

original: evam eva bhagavān daśasu dikṣu sadevakaṃ sendrakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśuddhāvāsam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
analyzed: evam eva bhagavān daśasu dikṣu sa devakam sa indrakam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa śuddhāvāsam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā

original: punar yādṛśaṃ bhagavataḥ prakṛtyātmabhāvopadarśanaṃ tādṛśam iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv upadarśayati sma /
analyzed: punar yādṛśam bhagavataḥ prakṛti ātma bhāva upadarśanam tādṛśam iha tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau upadarśayati sma

original: atha yāvanto 'smiṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devanikāyāḥ
analyzed: atha yāvantaḥ smin tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ devanikāyāḥ

analyzed: yāvat brahmakāyikā paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ tuṣitāḥ yāmāḥ trāyastriṃśāḥ

analyzed: divyāni mālyāni divyān gandhān divyāni vilepanāni divyāni cūrṇāni divyān vāsān divyāni

original: divyāny ābharaṇāni /
analyzed: divyāni ābharaṇāni

analyzed: divyāni chatrāṇi divyām dhvajān divyāḥ patākāḥ gṛhītvā yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāmanti sma

original: upasaṃkramya taiḥ puṣpādibhir yāvac chatradhvajapatākābhir bhagavantam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti
analyzed: upasaṃkramya taiḥ puṣpa ādibhiḥ yāvat chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ bhagavantam avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti

original: smābhiprakiranti sma /
analyzed: sma abhiprakiranti sma

original: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyā vineyā bhājanībhūtās te jalajasthalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramya tathāgatam abhipūjayaṃti sma /
analyzed: ye ca iha tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ vineyāḥ bhājanībhūtāḥ te jala ja sthala jāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkramya tathāgatam abhipūjayaṃti sma

original: (LPG 5r) sarvāṇi ca tāni puṣpādīni yāvac chatradhvajapatākā bhagavaty avakīrṇāni /
analyzed: r sarvāṇi ca tāni puṣpa ādīni yāvat chattra dhvaja patākāḥ bhagavanti avakīrṇāni

original: samanantaram eva bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātupramāṇo bhagavata
analyzed: samanantaram eva bhagavataḥ dhiṣṭhānena tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātu pramāṇaḥ

original: upari vaihāyase mūrdhasandhau mahāpuṣpādikūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt* tataś ca kūṭāgārād
analyzed: upari vaihāyase mūrdha sandhau mahāpuṣpa ādi kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthitaḥ bhūt tatas ca kūṭāgārāt

original: divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni pralaṃbante sma pralaṃbante smābhipralaṃbante sma /
analyzed: divyāni puṣpa paṭṭa dāmāni pralaṃbante sma pralaṃbante sma abhipralaṃbante sma

original: taiś ca puṣpapaṭṭadāmābhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsenātyarthaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
analyzed: taiḥ ca puṣpa paṭṭa dāmābhiḥ ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ tena ca suvarṇa varṇena bhagavataḥ prabhā avabhāsena atyartham śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate

original: yathā cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
analyzed: yathā ca ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ evam diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamāl

original: lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
analyzed: lokadhātavaḥ vabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāḥ ca abhūvan evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām

original: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ spuṭāś cābhūvan*
analyzed: adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu lokadhātavaḥ vabhāsitāḥ spuṭāḥ ca abhūvan

original: tatra jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakadarśanam atmabhāvan dṛṣṭvaivam
analyzed: tatra jāṃbūdvīpakānām manuṣyāṇām tathāgatasya asecanaka darśanam atma bhāvan dṛṣṭvā evam

original: abhavat* asmākaṃ purataḥ tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharman deśayatīti /
analyzed: abhavat asmākam puratas tathāgataḥ niṣaṇṇaḥ dharman deśayati iti

original: yathā jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇām evaṃ godānīyānāṃ pūrvavidehakānām uttarakauravāṇāṃ
analyzed: yathā jāṃbūdvīpakānām manuṣyāṇām evam godānīyānām pūrvavidehakānām uttara kauravāṇām

original: cāturmahārajakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvad aghaniṣṭhānān devānāṃ evaṃ sāhasre lokadhātau
analyzed: cāturmahārajakāyikānām devānām yāvat agha niṣṭhānān devānām evam sāhasre lokadhātau

original: dvisāhasre trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasatvānām etad abhūt* asmākaṃ puratas
analyzed: dvi sāhasre tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sarva satvānām etat abhūt asmākam puratas

original: tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharman deśayatīti /
analyzed: tathāgataḥ niṣaṇṇaḥ dharman deśayati iti

original: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayā
analyzed: atha bhagavān tasmin eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva prabhām prāmuṃcat yayā prabhayā

original: punar evāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt* yenāvabhāsena ya
analyzed: punar eva ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ avabhāsitaḥ bhūt yena avabhāsena yaḥ

original: iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
analyzed: iha tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau satvāḥ te sarve pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān paśyanti sma /
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān sa śrāvaka saṃghān paśyanti sma

original: tatra ca pūrvasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
analyzed: tatra ca diśi ye gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāḥ te pi imam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram

original: lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ sabhikṣusaṃghaparivāram adrākṣur
analyzed: lokadhātum bhagavantam ca śākyamunim tathāgatam sa bhikṣu saṃgha parivāram adrākṣuḥ

original: yathā ca pūrvasyān diśy evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ (LPG 5v)
analyzed: yathā ca diśi evam dakṣiṇasyām

original: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
analyzed: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu satvāḥ te pi imam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum bhagavantam ca śākyamunim

original: tathāgataṃ sabhikṣusaṃghaparivāram adrākṣuḥ //
analyzed: tathāgatam sa bhikṣu saṃgha parivāram adrākṣuḥ

original: atha pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātū
analyzed: atha pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarva paścimā lokadhātū

original: ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate
analyzed: ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaraḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhṛyate

original: yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
analyzed: yāpayati saḥ imām eva prajñāpāramitām bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām saṃprakāśayati

original: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
analyzed: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmiḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ tam mahāntam avabhāsam

original: taṃ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ taṃ ca tathāgatātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavān ratnākaras
analyzed: tam ca mahāntam pṛthivīcālam tam ca tathāgata ātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavān ratnākaraḥ

original: tathāgatas tenopasaṃkrānta-r-upasaṃkramya taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnākaraṃ tathāgatam etad
analyzed: tathāgataḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya tam bhagavantam ratnākaram tathāgatam etat

original: avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya
analyzed: avocat kaḥ bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ sya mahataḥ vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya

original: ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya ayaṃ cedṛśas tathāgatakāyaḥ sandṛśyate /
analyzed: ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya ayam ca īdṛśaḥ tathāgata kāyaḥ sandṛśyate

original: evam ukte bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgatas taṃ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān ratnākaraḥ tathāgataḥ tam samantaraśmim bodhisatvam mahāsatvam

original: etad avocat* eṣa kulaputra paścimāyān diśi sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir
analyzed: etat avocat eṣa kula putra paścimāyān diśi sahāḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamuniḥ

original: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati /
analyzed: nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati

original: sa bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
analyzed: sa bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām prajñāpāramitām saṃprakāśayati

original: tasyaiṣa īdṛśo 'nubhāva atha samantaraśmir bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ bhagavantaṃ
analyzed: tasya eṣaḥ īdṛśaḥ nubhāvaḥ atha samantaraśmiḥ bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ tam bhagavantam

original: ratnākaraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat* gaccheyam ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāl lokadhātum
analyzed: ratnākaram tathāgatam etat avocat gaccheyam aham bhagavan tām sahāt lokadhātum

original: tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
analyzed: tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya

original: teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kumārabhūtānāṃ dhāraṇīpratisaṃvitpratilabdhānāṃ samādhisamāpattivaśitāpratilabdhānāṃ sa bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgata /
analyzed: teṣām ca bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām teṣām ca sarveṣām kumāra bhūtānām dhāraṇī pratisaṃvid pratilabdhānām samādhi samāpatti vaśitā pratilabdhānām sa bhagavān ratnākaraḥ tathāgata

original: āha /
analyzed: āha

original: gaccha tvaṃ (LPG 6r)
analyzed: gaccha tvad r

original: kulaputra 'sya śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
analyzed: kula putra śākyamuneḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: atha ratnākaras tathāgataḥ suvarṇanirbhāsānāṃ sahasrapatrāṇāṃ padmānāṃ sahasraṃ samantaraśmaye
analyzed: atha ratnākaraḥ tathāgataḥ suvarṇa nirbhāsānām sahasra patrāṇām padmānām sahasram samantaraśmaye

original: bodhisatvāya mahasatvāya prādāt* imaiḥ kulaputra padmais taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ
analyzed: bodhisatvāya mahasatvāya prādāt imaiḥ kula putra padmaiḥ tam bhagavantam śākyamunim

original: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham abhyavakira saṃprajānaccārī ca kulaputra tatra
analyzed: tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham abhyavakira saṃprajānat cārī ca kula putra tatra

original: buddhakṣetre bhaves tat kasya hetoḥ durāsadā hi kulaputra te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā
analyzed: buddhakṣetre bhaveḥ tat kasya hetoḥ durāsadāḥ hi kula putra te bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvā

original: ye tatra lokadhātāv upapannā mā tatra kṣaṇyethā /
analyzed: ye tatra lokadhātau upapannāḥ mā tatra kṣaṇyethāḥ

original: atha samantaraśmir bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tasya bhagavato ratnākarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
analyzed: atha samantaraśmiḥ bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ tasya bhagavataḥ ratnākarasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāt tāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni gṛhītvānekair
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhasya antikāt tāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni gṛhītvā anekaiḥ

original: bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakadārikārūpaiś
analyzed: bodhisatva koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ sārdham gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiḥ ca dāraka dārikā rūpaiḥ

original: ca tato buddhakṣetrād antarhitaḥ yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dṛyante yāpayaṃti /
analyzed: ca tatas buddhakṣetrāt antarhitaḥ yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dṛyante yāpayanti

original: tān sarvān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan* puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanair
analyzed: tān sarvān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpaiḥ mālyaiḥ gandhaiḥ vilepanaiḥ

original: yāvac chatradhvajapatākābhir mahatyā bodhisatvardhyā mahatā bodhisatvānubhāvena yena
analyzed: yāvat chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ mahatyā bodhisatva ṛdhyā mahatā bodhisatva anubhāvena yena

original: sa bhagavāṃc chākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrānta-r-upasaṃkramya
analyzed: sa bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya

original: bhagavataḥ śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte
analyzed: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte

original: 'sthād ekāntasthitaḥ samantaraśmir bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat*
analyzed: sthāt ekānta sthitaḥ samantaraśmiḥ bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ratnākaro bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavato 'lpāvādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty
analyzed: ratnākaraḥ bhagavan tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ bhagavataḥ lpa avādha tām paripṛcchati

original: alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ balaṃ ca sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca /
analyzed: alpa ātaṅka tām laghu utthāna tām balam ca sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca

original: imāni ca tena bhagavatā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni prahitāni /
analyzed: imāni ca tena bhagavatā suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni prahitāni

original: bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pūjā karmaṇe

original: atha bhagavāṃs tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
analyzed: atha bhagavān tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tenākṣaipsīt* atha taiḥ padmais te
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tena akṣaipsīt atha taiḥ padmaiḥ te

original: sarve lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā 'bhūvan* tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgatavigrahā niṣaṇṇā dharman deśayanti sma /
analyzed: sarve lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāḥ bhūvan tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgata vigrahāḥ niṣaṇṇāḥ dharman deśayanti sma

original: (LPG 6v) yad utemā eva ṣaṭpāramitā ārabhya :
analyzed: u yat uta imāḥ eva ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ ārabhya

original: yaiś ca satvaiḥ sā dharmadeśanā śrutā te niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: yaiḥ ca satvaiḥ sā dharma deśanā śrutā te niyatāḥ abhavan anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: te 'pi gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāś ca dārakadārikāś ca svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlais tathāgataṃ satkurvanti sma gurukurvanti sma mānayaṃti
analyzed: te pi gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāḥ ca dāraka dārikāḥ ca svaka svakaiḥ kuśala mūlaiḥ tathāgatam satkurvanti sma gurukurvanti sma mānayaṃti

original: sma pūjayanti sma / //
analyzed: sma pūjayanti sma

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātuḥ
analyzed: evam diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarva paścimā lokadhātuḥ

original: sarvaśokāpagatā nāma tatrāśokaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati
analyzed: sarvaśokāpagatā nāma tatra aśokaśrīḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati

original: dhṛyate yāpayati tatra vigataśoko nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //
analyzed: dhṛyate yāpayati tatra vigataśokaḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatva yāvat vistareṇa kartavyam

original: evaṃ paścimāyān diśy upaśāntā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra ratnārcir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati /
analyzed: evam diśi upaśāntā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra ratnārciḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati

original: tatra cāritramatir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //
analyzed: tatra cāritramatiḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatva yāvat vistareṇa kartavyam

original: uttarasyān diśi jayā nāma lokadhātus tatra jayendro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas
analyzed: diśi jayāḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra jayendraḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra jayadatto nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //
analyzed: tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra jayadattaḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatva yāvat vistareṇa kartavyam

original: evam uttarapūrvasyān diśi samādhyalaṃkṛtā nāma lokadhātus tatra samādhihastyuttaraśrīr
analyzed: evam diśi samādhyalaṃkṛtāḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra samādhi hasti uttara śrīḥ

original: nāma tahāgatas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva
analyzed: nāma tahāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatva

original: yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //
analyzed: yāvat vistareṇa kartavyam

original: pūrvadakṣiṇasyān diśi bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārasurucirā nāma lokadhātus tatra padmottaraśrīr
analyzed: diśi bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārasurucirāḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra padma uttara śrīḥ

original: nāma tathāgatas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra padmahasto nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva
analyzed: nāma tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra padmahastaḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatva

original: yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //
analyzed: yāvat vistareṇa kartavyam

original: dakṣiṇapaścimāyān diśi vigatarajaḥsaṃcayā nāma lokadhātus tatra sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīr nāma tathāgatas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
analyzed: diśi vigatarajaḥsaṃcayā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra sūrya maṇḍala prabhāsa uttamaśrīḥ nāma tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: tatra sūryapratibhāso nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //
analyzed: tatra sūryapratibhāsaḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ yāvat vistareṇa kartavyam

original: paścimottarasyān diśi vaśībhūtā nāma lokadhātus tatraikacchatro nāma tathāgatas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra ratnottamo nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvo yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //
analyzed: diśi vaśībhūtāḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra ekacchatraḥ nāma tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra ratnottamaḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ yāvat vistareṇa kartavyam

original: (LPG 7r) adhastāddiśi padmā nāma lokadhātus tatra padmaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
analyzed: r adhastāt diśi padmāḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra padmaśrīḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: tatra padmottaro nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* upariṣṭāddiśi
analyzed: tatra padmottaraḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatva yāvat vistareṇa kartavyam upariṣṭāt diśi

original: gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātur nandā nāma tatra
analyzed: gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātuḥ nandā nāma tatra

original: nandaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati /
analyzed: nandaśrīḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati

original: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
analyzed: saḥ imām eva prajñāpāramitām bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām saṃprakāśayati

original: atha tatra lokadhātau nandadatto nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
analyzed: atha tatra lokadhātau nandadattaḥ nāma bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ tam mahāntam avabhāsam

original: tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ taṃ ca tathāgatātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavāṃ nandaśrīs
analyzed: tam ca mahāntam pṛthivīcālam tam ca tathāgata ātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavān nanda śrīḥ

original: tathāgatas tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya taṃ bhagavantaṃ nandaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad
analyzed: tathāgataḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya tam bhagavantam nandaśriyam tathāgatam etat

original: avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya
analyzed: avocat kaḥ bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ sya mahataḥ vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya

original: ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya ayaṃ cedṛśas tathāgatakāyaḥ sandṛśyate /
analyzed: ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya ayam ca īdṛśaḥ tathāgata kāyaḥ sandṛśyate

original: evam ukte sa bhagavān nandaśrīs tathāgatas taṃ nandadattaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam
analyzed: evam ukte sa bhagavān nandaśrīḥ tathāgataḥ tam nandadattam bodhisatvam mahāsatvam

original: etad avocat* eṣa kulaputrādhastāddiśi sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma
analyzed: etat avocat eṣa kula putra adhastāt diśi sahāḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamuniḥ nāma

original: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati /
analyzed: tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati

original: sa bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
analyzed: sa bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām prajñāpāramitām saṃprakāśayati

original: tasyaiṣa īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha nandadatto bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ bhagavantaṃ nandaśriyaṃ
analyzed: tasya eṣaḥ īdṛśaḥ nubhāvaḥ atha nandadattaḥ bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ tam bhagavantam nanda śriyam

original: tathāgatam etad avocat* gaccheyam ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tasya bhagavataḥ
analyzed: tathāgatam etat avocat gaccheyam aham bhagavan tām sahām lokadhātum tasya bhagavataḥ

original: śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
analyzed: śākyamuneḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya

original: teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kumārabhūtānāṃ dhāraṇīpratisaṃvitpratilabdhānāṃ
analyzed: teṣām ca bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām teṣām ca sarveṣām kumāra bhūtānām dhāraṇī pratisaṃvid pratilabdhānām

original: sarvasamādhisamāpattivaśitāpratilabdhānāṃ sa bhagavān nandaśrīs tathāgata āha /
analyzed: sarva samādhi samāpatti vaśitā pratilabdhānām sa bhagavān nanda śrīḥ tathāgataḥ āha

original: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra tasya śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ (LPG 7v)
analyzed: gaccha tvam kula putra tasya śākyamuneḥ tathāgatasya arhant

original: samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: atha nandaśrīs tathāgataḥ suvarṇanirbhāsānāṃ sahasrapatrāṇāṃ padmānāṃ sahasraṃ nandadattāya
analyzed: atha nandaśrīḥ tathāgataḥ suvarṇa nirbhāsānām sahasra patrāṇām padmānām sahasram nandadattāya

original: bodhisatvāya mahāsatvāya prādāt* imaiḥ kulaputra padmais taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ
analyzed: bodhisatvāya mahāsatvāya prādāt imaiḥ kula putra padmaiḥ tam bhagavantam śākyamunim

original: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham abhyavakira saṃprajānacārī ca kulaputra tatra
analyzed: tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham abhyavakira saṃprajāna cārī ca kula putra tatra

original: buddhakṣetre bhavet tat kasya hetoḥ durāsadā hi kulaputra te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā
analyzed: buddhakṣetre bhavet tat kasya hetoḥ durāsadāḥ hi kula putra te bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvā

original: ye tatra lokadhātāv upapannā mā tatra kṣaṇyethā atha nandadatto bodhisatvo mahāsatvas
analyzed: ye tatra lokadhātau upapannāḥ mā tatra kṣaṇyethāḥ atha nandadattaḥ bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ

original: tasya bhagavato nandaśriyas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāt tāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni
analyzed: tasya bhagavataḥ nandaśriyaḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya antikāt tāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni

original: sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni gṛhītvānekair bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ gṛhasthaiḥ
analyzed: sahasra patrāṇi padmāni gṛhītvā anekaiḥ bodhisatva koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ sārdham gṛhasthaiḥ

original: pravrajitaiś ca dārakadārikarūpaiś ca tato buddhakṣetrād antarhitaḥ yāvanta upariṣṭāddiśi
analyzed: pravrajitaiḥ ca dāraka dārika rūpaiḥ ca tatas buddhakṣetrāt antarhitaḥ yāvantaḥ upariṣṭāt diśi

original: buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dṛyante yāpayanti tān sarvān satkurvaṃ gurukurvan mānayan
analyzed: buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dṛyante yāpayanti tān sarvān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan

original: pūjayan* puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanair yāvac chatradhvajapatākābhiḥ mahatyā
analyzed: pūjayan puṣpaiḥ mālyaiḥ gandhaiḥ vilepanaiḥ yāvat chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ mahatyā

original: bodhisatvardhyā mahatā bodhisatvānubhāvena /
analyzed: bodhisatva ṛdhyā mahatā bodhisatva anubhāvena

original: yena bhagavāṃc chākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya
analyzed: yena bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya

original: bhagavataḥ śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte
analyzed: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte

original: 'sthād ekāntasthitaḥ nandadatto bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat* nandaśrīr
analyzed: sthāt ekānta sthitaḥ nandadattaḥ bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat nanda śrīḥ

original: bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavato 'lpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ
analyzed: bhagavan tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ bhagavataḥ lpa ābādha tām paripṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām

original: laghūtthānatāṃ balaṃ ca sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca imāni ca tena bhagavatā suvarṇanirbhāsāni
analyzed: laghu utthāna tām balam ca sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca imāni ca tena bhagavatā suvarṇa nirbhāsāni

original: sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
analyzed: sahasra patrāṇi padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ pūjā karmaṇe

original: atha bhagavāṃs tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te upariṣṭāddiśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu (LPG 8r)
analyzed: atha bhagavān tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te upariṣṭāt diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tenākṣaipsīt* atha taiḥ padmais te
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tena akṣaipsīt atha taiḥ padmaiḥ te

original: sarve lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan* tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgatavigrahā niṣaṇṇā dharman deśayanti sma /
analyzed: sarve lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāḥ abhūvan tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgata vigrahāḥ niṣaṇṇāḥ dharman deśayanti sma

original: yad utemā eva ṣaṭpāramitā ārabhya :
analyzed: yat uta imāḥ eva ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ ārabhya

original: yaiś ca satvaiḥ sā dharmadeśanā śrutā te niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: yaiḥ ca satvaiḥ sā dharma deśanā śrutā te niyatāḥ abhavan anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: te 'pi bodhisatvā gṛhasthā pravrajitāś ca dārakadārikāś ca svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlais tathāgataṃ satkurvanti sma gurukurvanti sma /
analyzed: te pi bodhisatvāḥ gṛhasthā pravrajitāḥ ca dāraka dārikāḥ ca svaka svakaiḥ kuśala mūlaiḥ tathāgatam satkurvanti sma gurukurvanti sma

original: mānayaṃti sma pūjayaṃti sma / //
analyzed: mānayaṃti sma pūjayaṃti sma

original: atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātū ratnamayaḥ saṃsthito
analyzed: atha tena kṣaṇa lava muhūrtena ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ ratna mayaḥ saṃsthitaḥ

original: 'bhūt* vicitrapuṣpābhikīrṇo 'vasaktapaṭṭadāmāgandhaghaṭikānirdhūpitaḥ sarvapuṣpagandhavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitaḥ
analyzed: bhūt vicitra puṣpa abhikīrṇaḥ sarva puṣpa gandhavṛkṣa pratimaṇḍitaḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma padmāvatī lokadhātuḥ samantakusumasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma padmāvatī lokadhātuḥ samantakusumasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya

original: buddhakṣetraṃ yatra maṃjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prativasati susthitamatiś ca devaputro
analyzed: buddhakṣetram yatra maṃjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ prativasati susthita matiḥ ca devaputraḥ

original: 'nye ca mahaujaskā bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvā
analyzed: nye ca mahā ojaskāḥ bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvā

original: // prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nidānaparivartaḥ prathamaḥ // // //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām nidāna parivartaḥ prathamaḥ

original: yadā ca bhagavān ājñāsīt sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samāgataṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīprajāḥ
analyzed: yadā ca bhagavān ājñāsīt sa devakam lokam samāgatam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇī prajāḥ

original: sadevamānuṣīs tāṃś ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvān* yadbhūyastvena kumārabhūtān tadā bhagavān
analyzed: sa deva mānuṣīḥ tān ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvān yad bhūyastvena kumāra bhūtān tadā bhagavān

original: āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayata :
analyzed: āyuṣmantam śāradvatīputram āmantrayata

original: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākāram sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena
analyzed: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākāram sarva dharmān abhisaṃboddhu kāmena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam ukte ayuṣmāṃc chāriputro bhagavantam etad
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam ukte ayuṣmān śāriputraḥ bhagavantam etat

original: avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena
analyzed: avocat katham bhagavam bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākāram sarva dharmān abhisaṃboddhu kāmena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāradvatīputram etad

original: avocat* iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā asthānayogena
analyzed: avocat iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām sthitvā asthāna yogena

original: dānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā aparityāgayogena (LPG 8v)
analyzed: dāna pāramitā paripūrayitavyā a parityāga yogena v

original: deyadāyaparigrāhakānupalabdhitām upādāya /
analyzed: deya dāya parigrāhaka anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitā paripūrayitavyā āpattyanāpattyanadhyāpattitām upādāya /
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitā paripūrayitavyā āpatti anāpatti anadhyāpatti tām upādāya

original: kṣāntipāramitā paripūrayitavyā akṣobhaṇatām upādāya /
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitā paripūrayitavyā a kṣobhaṇa tām upādāya

original: vīryapāramitā paripūrayitavyā kāyikacaitasikavīryāsraṃsanatām upādāya /
analyzed: vīrya pāramitā paripūrayitavyā kāyika caitasika vīrya āsraṃsana tām upādāya

original: dhyānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā dhyānamadānāsvādanatām upādāya /
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitā paripūrayitavyā dhyāna madāna āsvādana tām upādāya

original: prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā sarvadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā sarva dharma anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śāradvatīputra sthitvā bodhisatvena mahāsatvena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayitavyāni smṛtyanupalabdhitām upādāya /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śāradvatīputra sthitvā bodhisatvena mahāsatvena catvāri smṛti upasthānāni paripūrayitavyāni smṛti anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ catvāri samyakprahāṇāni /
analyzed: evam catvāri samyakprahāṇāni

original: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ paṃcendriyāṇi paṃca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaḥ
analyzed: catvāraḥ ṛddhipādāḥ paṃca indriyāṇi paṃca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭāṃgaḥ mārgaḥ

original: paripūrayitavyaḥ śunyatāsamādhir ānimittaḥ samādhir apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ
analyzed: paripūrayitavyaḥ śunyatā samādhiḥ ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ

original: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni /
analyzed: catvāri dhyānāni catvāri apramāṇāni

original: catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayaḥ paṃcābhijñā nava saṃjñāḥ vyādhyātmakasaṃjñā :
analyzed: catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva samāpattayaḥ paṃca abhijñāḥ nava saṃjñāḥ vyādhi ātmaka saṃjñā

original: vipaṭumakasaṃjñā /
analyzed: vipaṭumaka saṃjñā

original: vipūtikasaṃjñā :
analyzed: vipūtika saṃjñā

original: vilohitakasaṃjñā :
analyzed: vilohitaka saṃjñā

original: vinīlakasaṃjñā :
analyzed: vinīlaka saṃjñā

original: vikhāditakasaṃjñā :
analyzed: vikhāditaka saṃjñā

original: vikṣiptakasaṃjñā :
analyzed: vikṣiptaka saṃjñā

original: asthikasaṃjñā :
analyzed: asthika saṃjñā

original: vidagdhakasaṃjñā :
analyzed: vidagdhaka saṃjñā

original: buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtis tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtir ānāpānānusmṛtir udvegānusmṛtir maraṇānusmṛtiḥ kāyagatānusmṛtiḥ anityasaṃjñā duḥkhasaṃjñā /
analyzed: buddha anusmṛtiḥ dharma anusmṛtiḥ saṃgha anusmṛtiḥ śīla anusmṛtiḥ tyāga anusmṛtiḥ devatā anusmṛtiḥ āna apāna anusmṛtiḥ udvega anusmṛtiḥ maraṇa anusmṛtiḥ kāya gata anusmṛtiḥ anitya saṃjñā duḥkha saṃjñā

original: anātmasaṃjñā /
analyzed: anātma saṃjñā

original: aśubhasaṃjñā maraṇasaṃjñā sarvatra loke anabhiratisaṃjñā /
analyzed: aśubha saṃjñā maraṇa saṃjñā sarvatra loke anabhirati saṃjñā

original: sarvatra loke aviśvāsasaṃjñā /
analyzed: sarvatra loke aviśvāsa saṃjñā

original: duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ
analyzed: duḥkha jñānam samudaya jñānam nirodha jñānam mārga jñānam kṣaya jñānam anutpāda jñānam

original: dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ paricayajñānaṃ yathāvajjñānam* savitarkaḥ
analyzed: dharma jñānam anvaya jñānam saṃvṛti jñānam paricaya jñānam yathāvat jñānam sa vitarkaḥ

original: savicāraḥ samādhir avitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ avitarkaḥ (LPG 9r)
analyzed: sa vicāra samādhi a vitarka vicāra mātra samādhi a vitarka

original: avicāraḥ samādhir anājñātamājñāsyāmītīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam abhibhvāyatanaṃ kṛtsnāyatanaṃ catvāri saṃgrahavastūni /
analyzed: avicāraḥ samādhiḥ an ājñātam ājñāsyāmi iti indriyam ājñā indriyam ājñātāvi indriyam abhibhvāyatanam kṛtsnāyatanam catvāri saṃgraha vastūni

original: catvāri vyavasthānāni /
analyzed: catvāri vyavasthānāni

original: daśa bhūmayo daśa caryā daśa kṣāntayo viṃśatir adhyāśayāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ /
analyzed: daśa bhūmayaḥ daśa caryāḥ daśa kṣāntayaḥ viṃśatiḥ adhyāśayāḥ sarvajña jñānam

original: śamathavipaśyanājñāne /
analyzed: śamatha vipaśyanā jñāne

original: tisro vidyā catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ catvāri vaiśāradyāny acyutāḥ paṃcābhijñāḥ ṣaṭ
analyzed: tisraḥ vidyā catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ catvāri vaiśāradyāni acyutāḥ paṃca abhijñāḥ ṣaṭ

original: pāramitāḥ sapta dhanāny aṣṭau mahāpuruṣavitarkā nava satvāvāsā daśa tathāgatabalāny
analyzed: pāramitāḥ sapta dhanāni aṣṭau mahāpuruṣa vitarkāḥ nava satva āvāsāḥ daśa tathāgata balāni

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā sarvākāravaropetaṃ sarvajñajñānam
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ mahā maitrī mahā karuṇā sarva ākāra vara upetam sarvajña jñānam

original: abhisaṃboddhukāmena mārgākārajñatāṃ sarvajñatāṃ sarvasatvacittacaritajñānākāratāṃ
analyzed: abhisaṃboddhu kāmena mārga ākāra jña tām sarvajña tām sarva satva citta carita jñāna ākāra tām

original: paripūrayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ sarvavāsanānusandhikleśān
analyzed: paripūrayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ sarva vāsanā anusandhi kleśān

original: prahātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evaṃ hi
analyzed: prahātu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam hi

original: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: bodhisatvanyāmaṃ śāradvatīputrāvakrāntukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bodhisatva nyāmam śāradvatīputra avakrāntu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī prajñātukāmena te ca bhūmī atikrāntukāmenāvaivartikabhūmau ca sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmī prajñātu kāmena te ca bhūmī atikrāntu kāmena a vaivartika bhūmau ca sthātu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: ṣaḍabhijñatāyāṃ sthātukāmena sarvasatvacittacaritavispanditāni jñātukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
analyzed: ṣaḍabhijña tāyām sthātu kāmena sarva satva citta carita vispanditāni jñātu kāmena sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām

original: jñānam abhibhavitukāmena tathā dhāraṇīmukhasamādhimukhaṃ pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena
analyzed: jñānam abhibhavitu kāmena tathā dhāraṇī mukha samādhi mukham pratilabdhu kāmena bodhisatvena

original: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitrīṇāṃ ca dānaṃ dadatāṃ
analyzed: sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yānikānām kula putrāṇām kula duhitrīṇām ca dānam dadatām

original: yāvat prajñāṃ bhāvayatām ekānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādena sarvaṃ tat kuśalamūlam
analyzed: yāvat prajñām bhāvayatām eka anumodanā sahagatena citta utpādena sarvam tat kuśala mūlam

original: abhibhavitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanam (LPG 9v)
analyzed: abhibhavitu kāmena sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām śīla samādhi prajñā vimukti vimukti jñāna darśana

original: ekānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīr
analyzed: eka anumodanā sahagatena citta utpādena abhibhavitu kāmena dhyāna vimokṣa samādhi samāpattīḥ

original: ekānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: eka anumodanā sahagatena citta utpādena abhibhavitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: alpaṃ dānaṃ dadataḥ pariṇamanāyogena katham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāpramāṇāparimāṇaṃ bhaved iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
analyzed: alpam dānam dadataḥ pariṇamana ayogena katham aprameya asaṃkhyeya apramāṇa aparimāṇam bhavet iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: evam alpaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣato kṣāntiṃ bhāvayato 'lpaṃ vīryam ārabhamāṇasyālpaṃ dhyānaṃ
analyzed: evam alpam śīlam rakṣataḥ kṣāntim bhāvayataḥ lpam vīryam ārabhamāṇasya alpam dhyānam

original: samāpadyamānasyālpaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ pariṇamanāyogena katham aprameyam asaṃkhyeyāpramāṇāparimāṇaṃ
analyzed: samāpadyamānasya alpam prajñām bhāvayataḥ pariṇamana ayogena katham aprameyam asaṃkhyeya apramāṇa aparimāṇam

original: bhaved iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bhavet iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātukāmena dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dāna pāramitāyām sthātu kāmena dāna pāramitām paripūrayitu kāmena

original: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caritukāmena /
analyzed: śīla pāramitāyām caritu kāmena

original: śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena /
analyzed: śīla pāramitām paripūrayitu kāmena

original: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caritukāmena /
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitāyām caritu kāmena

original: kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena /
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitām paripūrayitu kāmena

original: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caritukāmena /
analyzed: vīrya pāramitāyām caritu kāmena

original: vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena /
analyzed: vīrya pāramitām paripūrayitu kāmena

original: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritukāmena /
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitāyām caritu kāmena

original: dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam* prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitām paripūrayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām caritavyam prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: kathaṃ me sarvatra jātau buddhavigrahadarśanaṃ bhaved buddhacodanā /
analyzed: katham me sarvatra jātau buddha vigraha darśanam bhavet buddha codanā

original: buddhasamanvāhāro buddhābhirādhanaṃ buddhaparigraho bhaved iti /
analyzed: buddha samanvāhāraḥ buddha abhirādhanam buddha parigrahaḥ bhavet iti

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra buddhakāyaṃ pariniṣpādayitukāmena dvātriṃśataṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra buddhakāyam pariniṣpādayitu kāmena dvātriṃśatam mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇāni

original: pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* aśītim
analyzed: pratilabdhu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam aśītim

original: anuvyaṃjanāni pratilabdhukāmena sarvatra jātau jātismaratāṃ bodhicittāvipraṇāśatāṃ
analyzed: anuvyaṃjanāni pratilabdhu kāmena sarvatra jātau jāti smara tām bodhi citta a vipraṇāśa tām

original: sarvabodhisatvacaryāsaṃpramoṣatāṃ (LPG 10r)
analyzed: sarva bodhisatva caryā saṃpramoṣa tām

original: pratilabdhukāmena /
analyzed: pratilabdhu kāmena

original: sarvapāpamitrapāpasahāyān vivarjayitukāmena sarvabuddhabodhisatvakalyāṇamitrāṇy ārāgayitukāmena sarvamāramārakāyikadevatān nirjetukāmena sarvāvaraṇīyāni viśodhayitukāmena /
analyzed: sarva pāpa mitra pāpa sahāyān vivarjayitu kāmena sarva buddha bodhisatva kalyāṇa mitrāṇi ārāgayitu kāmena sarva māra māra kāyika devatān nirjetu kāmena sarva āvaraṇīyāni viśodhayitu kāmena

original: sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: sarva dharma an āvaraṇa tām pratilabdhu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: bodhisatvakulaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena buddhakulam ārāgayitukāmena triratnavaṃśānupacchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bodhisatva kulam niṣpādayitu kāmena buddha kulam ārāgayitu kāmena tri ratna vaṃśān upacchedāya sthātu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: kumārabhūmim anuprāptukāmena buddhabodhisatvair avirahitena bhavitukāmena bodhisatvabhūmīr
analyzed: kumāra bhūmim anuprāptu kāmena buddha bodhisatvaiḥ avirahitena bhavitu kāmena bodhisatva bhūmīḥ

original: atikrāntukāmena kṣipraṃ tathāgatabhūmīṃ paripūrayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
analyzed: atikrāntu kāmena kṣipram tathāgata bhūmīm paripūrayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair yair ākārair ākāṃkṣed buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ
analyzed: yaiḥ ca kuśala mūlaiḥ yaiḥ ākāraiḥ ākāṃkṣet buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartum gurukartum

original: mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni me kuśalamūlāni ta ākārāḥ samṛddhyeyur iti bodhisatvena
analyzed: mānayitum pūjayitum tāni me kuśala mūlāni te ākārāḥ samṛddhyeyuḥ iti bodhisatvena

original: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: sarvasatvān saṃtoṣayitukāmena sarvasatvānāmm āśāḥ paripūrayitukāmena /
analyzed: sarva satvān saṃtoṣayitu kāmena sarva satvānām āśāḥ paripūrayitu kāmena

original: annena pānena yānair vastrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiḥ śayanair
analyzed: annena pānena yānaiḥ vastraiḥ vibhūṣaṇaiḥ puṣpaiḥ mālyaiḥ gandhaiḥ vilepanaiḥ śayanaiḥ

original: āsanair upāśrayair glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvopakaraṇaparibhogaiḥ sarvasatvān
analyzed: āsanaiḥ upāśrayaiḥ glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāraiḥ sarva upakaraṇa paribhogaiḥ sarva satvān

original: saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
analyzed: saṃtarpayiṣyāmi iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāsatvās tān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra ye daśasu dikṣu gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu satva asatvāḥ tān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena

original: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu paṃcasv abhijñāsu triśaraṇagamane buddhadharmasaṃghaprasādapratilaṃbhe
analyzed: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣu apramāṇeṣu paṃcasu abhijñāsu triśaraṇa gamane buddha dharma saṃgha prasāda pratilaṃbhe

original: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (LPG 10v)
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām

original: śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: śikṣitavyam

original: ye vā te gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvān mahāyāne samādāpayitukāmena /
analyzed: ye vā te gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāḥ tān sarvān mahāyāne samādāpayitu kāmena

original: dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: dāna pāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām

original: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitāyām prajñāpāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ///
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ekam api kuśalacittotpādam akṣayaṃ kartukāmena bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*//
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra ekam api kuśala citta utpādam akṣayam kartu kāmena bodhimaṇḍa niṣadanāt bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ

original: bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
analyzed: bhagavantaḥ dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu

original: dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann
analyzed: dikṣu gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ te me varṇam bhāṣeran

original: iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāni pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra yāni diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi

original: tāni sarvāṇy ekacittotpādenopasaṃkrāntukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi eka citta utpādena upasaṃkrāntu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu

original: gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāni sarvāṇy ekacittotpādenopasaṃkrāntukāmena
analyzed: gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāni sarvāṇi eka citta utpādena upasaṃkrāntu kāmena

original: bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ekasvaraghoṣeṇa pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputre eka svara ghoṣeṇa diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu
analyzed: evan dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu

original: gaṃgānadīvālikopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: gaṃgā nadī vālikā upamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām

original: śikṣitavyam* (LPG 11r)
analyzed: śikṣ lpg

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra buddhotpādānupacchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvakulam
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra buddha utpādān upacchedāya sthātu kāmena bodhisatva kulam

original: ārakṣitukāmena buddhavaṃśānucchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: ārakṣitu kāmena buddha vaṃśa an ucchedāya sthātu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: adhyātmaśunyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena bahirdhāśunyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: adhyātma śunyatāyām sthātu kāmena bahirdhā śunyatāyām adhyātma bahirdhā śunyatāyām

analyzed: śunya tā a śunya tāyām

original: paramārthaśunyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: paramārtha śunya tāyām saṃskṛta śunya tāyām

analyzed: a saṃskṛta śunya tāyām

original: atyantaśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: atyanta śunya tāyām

original: anavarāgraśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: an avara agra śunya tāyām

original: anavakāraśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: an avakāra śunya tāyām

original: prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: prakṛti śunya tāyām

original: sarvadharmaśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: sarva dharma śunya tāyām

original: anupalaṃbhaśunyatāyāṃ * abhāvaśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: anupalaṃbha śunya tāyām abhāva śunya tāyām

original: svabhāvaśunyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: svabhāva śunya tāyām

original: abhāvasvabhāvaśunyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: abhāva svabhāva śunya tāyām sthātu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: ālaṃbanādhipateyasamanantarahetupratyayatām anuboddhukāmena /
analyzed: ālaṃbana ādhipateya samanantara hetu pratyaya tām anuboddhu kāmena

original: tathākāralakṣaṇāny avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: tathākāra lakṣaṇāni avaboddhu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatām avitathatām ananyatathatām avikāratathatāṃ yathāvattathātam avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: sarva dharmāṇām tathatām avitathatām ananya tathatām avikāra tathatām yathāvat tathātam avaboddhu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: sarvadharmāṇān dharmadhātum avaboddhukāmena sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtakoṭim avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
analyzed: sarva dharmāṇān dharmadhātum avaboddhu kāmena sarva dharmāṇām bhūtakoṭim avaboddhu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantyas tṛsāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau gaṃgānadīvālukās tāḥ sarvā jñātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatī putra yāvantyaḥ tṛ sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau gaṃgā nadī vālukāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ jñātu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: yas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudreṣv apskandho nadīṣu mahānadīṣu kunadīṣūtsasarastaḍākeṣu
analyzed: yaḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau mahā samudreṣu ap skandhaḥ nadīṣu mahā nadīṣu ku nadīṣu utsa saraḥ taḍākeṣu

original: palvaleṣu tan sarvaṃ śatadhābhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣeptukāmena na ca tanniśṛtān
analyzed: palvaleṣu tat sarvam śatadhā bhinnayā bālāgra koṭyā abhyutkṣeptu kāmena na ca tat niśṛtān

original: prāṇino viheṭhayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (LPG 11v)
analyzed: prāṇinaḥ viheṭhayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām

original: śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvāṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv agniskandhaḥ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatī putra yāvān tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau agni skandhaḥ

original: sa sarva ekajvālībhūto bhavet tadyathāpi nāma kalpoddāhe vartamāne tam enam ekena
analyzed: sa sarvaḥ eka jvālībhūtaḥ bhavet tat yathā api nāma kalpa uddāhe vartamāne tam enam ekena

original: mukhavāyunā nirvāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: mukha vāyunā nirvāpayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yās trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bātamaṇḍalyo yā
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatī putra yāḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau bāta maṇḍalyaḥ yā

original: imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vidhunuyur vikireyur vidhvaṃseyus tadyathāpi
analyzed: imam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum vidhunuyuḥ vikireyuḥ vidhvaṃseyuḥ tat yathā api

original: nāma busamuṣṭin tāḥ sarvā ekenāṅgulyāḥ prāntakena saṃcchādayitukāmena viṣkaṃbhayitukāmena
analyzed: nāma busa muṣṭin tāḥ sarvāḥ ekena aṅgulyāḥ prāntakena saṃcchādayitu kāmena viṣkaṃbhayitu kāmena

original: bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv ākāśadhātus taṃ sarvam ekaparyaṃkena spharitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatī putra yaḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau ākāśa dhātuḥ tam sarvam eka paryaṃkena spharitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatī putra yāvantaḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sumeru cakravāḍa mahā cakravāḍāḥ

original: parvatarājās tān sarvān ekabālena badhvābhyutkṣipyāprameyān asaṃkhyeyāl lokadhātūn
analyzed: parvata rājāḥ tān sarvān eka bālena badhvā abhyutkṣipya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn

original: kṣipeyam iti tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: kṣipeyam iti tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvāṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tṛṇavṛkṣagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatī putra yāvān tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau tṛṇa vṛkṣa gulma oṣadhi vanaspatayaḥ

original: loṣṭadaṇḍaśarkarāpāṣāṇaparvatāmahāpṛthivīsaṃcayas taṃ sarvaṃ paramāṇurajoyogena jñātukāmena
analyzed: loṣṭa daṇḍa śarkarā pāṣāṇa parvata amahā pṛthivī saṃcayaḥ tam sarvam paramāṇu rajaḥ yogena jñātu kāmena

original: bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: buddhā bhagavantaḥ sabodhisatvāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tān sarvān ekapiṇḍapātena pratipādayitukāmena
analyzed: buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa bodhisatvāḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ tān sarvān eka piṇḍapātena pratipādayitu kāmena

original: ekapuṣpeṇaikamālyenaikagandhenaikavilepanenaikacūrṇenaikacīvareṇaikacchatreṇaikadhvajenaikapatākayā
analyzed: eka puṣpeṇa eka mālyena eka gandhena eka vilepanena eka cūrṇena eka cīvareṇa eka chatreṇa eka dhvajena eka patākayā

original: tān sarvān tathāgatān arhataḥ (LPG 12r)
analyzed: tān sarvān tathāgatān arh

original: samyaksaṃbuddhān sabodhisatvān saśrāvakasaṃghān satkartukāmena gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena pūjayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhān sa bodhisatvān sa śrāvaka saṃghān satkartu kāmena gurukartu kāmena mānayitu kāmena pūjayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
analyzed: evam diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu

original: dikṣv aikaikasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ sabodhisatvāḥ
analyzed: dikṣu ā ekaikasyān diśi ye gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa bodhisatvāḥ

original: saśrāvakasaṃghās tān sarvān ekapiṇḍapātena pratipādayitukāmenaikapuṣpeṇaikamālyenaikagandhenaikavilepanenaikacūrṇenaikacīvareṇaikacchatreṇaikadhvajenaikapatākayā
analyzed: sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ tān sarvān eka piṇḍapātena pratipādayitu kāmena eka puṣpeṇa eka mālyena eka gandhena eka vilepanena eka cūrṇena eka cīvareṇa eka chatreṇa eka dhvajena eka patākayā

original: tan sarvāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān sabodhisatvān saśrāvakasaṃghān satkartukāmena
analyzed: tat sarvān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān sa bodhisatvān sa śrāvaka saṃghān satkartu kāmena

original: gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena pūjayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: gurukartu kāmena mānayitu kāmena pūjayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāḥ

original: tān sarvāṃc chīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmenaivaṃ samādhiskandhe prajñāskandhe vimuktiskandhe
analyzed: tān sarvān śīla skandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena evam samādhi skandhe prajñā skandhe vimukti skandhe

original: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena evaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
analyzed: vimukti jñāna darśana skandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena evam srotaāpatti phale pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena

original: sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
analyzed: sakṛdāgāmi phale anāgāmi phale arhatve pratyeka bodhau yāvat an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau

original: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvāṃc chīlaskandhe /
analyzed: evam diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāḥ tān sarvān śīla skandhe

original: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmenaivaṃ samādhiskandhe prajñāskandhe /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena evam samādhi skandhe prajñā skandhe

original: vimuktiskandhe vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena evaṃ srotaāpattiphale
analyzed: vimukti skandhe vimukti jñāna darśana skandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena evam srotaāpatti phale

original: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sakṛdāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena sakṛdāgāmi phale arhatve pratyeka bodhau yāvat an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau

original: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: (LPG 12v) punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvanto daśadigloke sarvalokadhātuṣu satvās
analyzed: punar apara śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ daśan digloke sarva lokadhātuṣu satvāḥ

original: tān sarvāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena ca parinirvāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
analyzed: tān sarvām śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yānena ca parinirvāpayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā dānam

original: dadatā evaṃ śikṣitavyam* yad evaṃ dānaṃ datvā mahāphalaṃ bhavaty evaṃ dānaṃ datvā
analyzed: dadatā evam śikṣitavyam yat evam dānam da tvā mahā phalam bhavati evam dānam da tvā

original: kṣatriyamahāsālakuleṣūpapadyat';
analyzed: kṣatriya mahāsāla kuleṣu upapadyat

original: aivaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakuleṣūpapadyate /
analyzed: ā evam brāhmaṇa mahāsāla kuleṣu upapadyate

original: gṛhapatimahāsālakuleṣūpapadyat';
analyzed: gṛhapati mahāsāla kuleṣu upapadyat

original: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad eva dānaṃ niśrāya cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
analyzed: evam dānam da tvā tat eva dānam niśrāya cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣu upapadyate

original: evaṃ trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
analyzed: evam trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu upapadyate

original: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad evaṃ dānaṃ niśrāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyaṃ tritīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam utpādyate ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
analyzed: evam dānam da tvā tat evam dānam niśrāya prathamam dhyānam samāpadyate dvitīyam tritīyam caturtham dhyānam utpādyate ākāśa anaṃtya āyatana samāpattim samāpadyate

original: vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate evaṃ dānaṃ datvāryāṣṭāṃgo mārga utpādyate
analyzed: vijñāna ānantya āyatana samāpattim ākiṃcanya āyatana samāpattim na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatana samāpattim samāpadyate evam dānam da tvā ārya aṣṭa aṃgaḥ mārgaḥ utpādyate

original: evaṃ srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpyate /
analyzed: evam srotaāpatti phalam anuprāpyate

original: sakṛdāgāmiphalam anuprāpyate /
analyzed: sakṛdāgāmi phalam anuprāpyate

original: anāgāmiphalam anuprāpyate 'rhatvam anuprāpyate /
analyzed: anāgāmi phalam anuprāpyate rha tvam anuprāpyate

original: pratyekabodhir anuprāpyate 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuprāpyate / //
analyzed: pratyeka bodhiḥ anuprāpyate nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ anuprāpyate

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ jānāty evam upāyakauśalyena dānaṃ dattaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caram jānāti evam upāya kauśalyena dānam dattam dāna pāramitām paripūrayati

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati /
