analyzed: evam śīla pāramitām kṣānti pāramitām vīrya pāramitām dhyāna pāramitām prajñāpāramitām paripūrayati

original: athāyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānaṃ dadatā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śāradvatī putraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat katham bhagavam bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānam dadatā dāna pāramitā paripūritā bhavati

original: kathaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
analyzed: katham yāvat prajñāpāramitā paripūritā bhavati

original: bhagavān āha /
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: anupalaṃbhayogena śāradvatīputra (LPG 13r)
analyzed: anupalaṃbha yogena śāradvatīputra

original: dānasya dāyakasya parigrāhakasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
analyzed: dānasya dāyakasya parigrāhakasya tri maṇḍala pariśuddhyā dāna pāramitā paripūritā bhavati

original: evam āpattyanāpattyanadhyāpattitām upādāya śīlapāramitā /
analyzed: evam āpatti anāpatti anadhyāpatti tām upādāya śīla pāramitā

original: akṣobhaṇatām upādāya kṣāntipāramitā /
analyzed: akṣobhaṇa tām upādāya kṣānti pāramitā

original: kāyacittavīryāsraṃsanatā vīryapāramitā /
analyzed: kāya citta vīrya āsraṃsana tā vīrya pāramitā

original: avikṣepāsaṃkalpanatām upādāya dhyānapāramitā /
analyzed: a vikṣepa a saṃkalpana tām upādāya dhyāna pāramitā

original: sarvadharmaprajānanānupalaṃbhayogena prajñāpāramitā paripūritā bhavati / // //
analyzed: sarva dharma prajānana anupalaṃbha yogena prajñāpāramitā paripūritā bhavati

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām sarvabuddhaguṇān prajñātukāmenānuprāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām sarva buddha guṇān prajñātu kāmena anuprāptu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāraṃgaṃtukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra saṃskṛta a saṃskṛtānām dharmāṇām pāraṃgaṃtu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: evaṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃ rūpyarūpiṇāṃ vyākṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ niyatāniyatānāṃ nairyāṇikānairyāṇikānām
analyzed: evam sa āsrava anāsravāṇām dharmāṇām kuśala akuśalānām laukika lokottarāṇām rūpya rūpiṇām vyākṛta avyākṛtānām niyata aniyatānām nairyāṇika anairyāṇikānām

original: hānabhāgīyānāṃ viśeṣabhāgīyānāṃ pṛthagjānadharmāṇāṃ āryadharmāṇāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisatvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
analyzed: hāna bhāgīyānām viśeṣa bhāgīyānām pṛthak jāna dharmāṇām ārya dharmāṇām śaikṣa aśaikṣa dharmāṇām śrāvaka pratyekabuddha dharmāṇām bodhisatva dharmāṇām buddha dharmāṇām

original: sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃgaṃtukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: sarva dharmāṇām pāraṃgaṃtu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatām anuboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām sarva dharmāṇām tathatām anuboddhu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: sarvadharmāṇām anutpādakoṭim anuprāptukāmena bhūtakoṭiṃ prativeddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: sarva dharmāṇām anutpāda koṭim anuprāptu kāmena bhūtakoṭim prativeddhu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvaṃgamena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām pūrvaṃgamena bhavitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakena (LPG 13v)
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānām bhagavatām upasthāyakena

original: bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bhavitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhyantaraparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānām bhagavatām abhyantara parivāreṇa bhavitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena mahāparivāreṇa bhavatukāmena bodhisatvaparivāraṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena mahā parivāreṇa bhavatu kāmena bodhisatva parivāram pratilabdhu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvadātrīṇāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarva dātrīṇām dakṣiṇām śodhayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dāne 'navagṛhītacittena bhavitukāmena
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dāne nava gṛhīta cittena bhavitu kāmena

original: dauḥśīlyacittaṃ pṛthakkartukāmena vyāpādacittam utsraṣṭukāmena kausīdyacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam
analyzed: dauḥśīlya cittam pṛthakkartu kāmena vyāpāda cittam utsraṣṭu kāmena kausīdya cittam dauṣprajña cittam

original: anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: an utpādayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasattvān dānamaye puṇyakṛyāvastuni
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarva sattvān dāna maye puṇya kṛyā vastuni

original: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena śīlamaye bhāvanāmaye vaiyāpṛtyasahagate sarvauṣadhikasahagate
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena śīla maye bhāvanā maye vaiyāpṛtya sahagate sarvauṣadhika sahagate

original: puṇyakṛyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: puṇya kṛyā vastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākārāṇi paṃca cakṣuṃṣi niṣpādayitukāmena /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarva ākārāṇi paṃca cakṣuṃṣi niṣpādayitu kāmena

original: māṃsacakṣur divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur niṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
analyzed: māṃsa cakṣuḥ divyam cakṣuḥ prajñā cakṣuḥ dharma cakṣuḥ buddha cakṣuḥ niṣpādayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ (LPG 14r)
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ dakṣiṇasyām

original: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi
analyzed: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyān diśi

original: gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tān sarvān divyena cakṣuṣā draṣṭukāmena
analyzed: gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tān sarvān divyena cakṣuṣā draṣṭu kāmena

original: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śrotukāmena
analyzed: yam ca te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ dharmam bhāṣante tam sarvam divyena śrotreṇa śrotu kāmena

original: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñātukāmena /
analyzed: teṣām ca buddhānām bhagavatām cetasā eva cittam prajñātu kāmena

original: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ bodhisatvacaryām anusmartukāmena
analyzed: teṣām ca buddhānām bhagavatām pūrva yoga sahagatām bodhisatva caryām anusmartu kāmena

original: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anekavidham ṛddhividhivikurvitaṃ saṃdraṣṭukāmena bodhisatvena
analyzed: teṣām ca buddhānām bhagavatām anekavidham ṛddhi vidhi vikurvitam saṃdraṣṭu kāmena bodhisatvena

original: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yan te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yan te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ samantāt

original: daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ śrutvānācchedyena
analyzed: daśasu dikṣu gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmam bhāṣante tam śrutvā an ācchedyena

original: smṛtibalādhānena sandhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha
analyzed: smṛti bala ādhānena sandhārayitu kāmena yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha

original: etasminn antare sarvam avipraṇāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: etasmin antare sarvam a vipraṇāśayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām

original: bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhīś ca pariniṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bhagavatām buddhakṣetrāṇi ca buddhakṣetra pariśuddhīḥ ca pariniṣpādayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcid tathāgatena bhāṣitam sūtram geyam vyākaraṇam

original: gāthodānanidānetyuktakajātakavaipulyāvadānopadeśādbhutadharmā yac chrāvakair na śrutaṃ
analyzed: gāthā udāna nidāna iti uktaka jātaka vaipulya avadāna upadeśa adbhuta dharmāḥ yat śrāvakaiḥ na śrutam

original: tat sarvaṃ paryavāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: tat sarvam paryavāptu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcid pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: sarvabuddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām
analyzed: sarva buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ bhāṣitam bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate evan diśi paścimāyām

original: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu yat kiṃcit sarvabuddhair
analyzed: uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu yat kiṃcid sarva buddhaiḥ

original: bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate tat sarvaṃ śrotukāmenodgrahītukāmena (LPG 14v)
analyzed: bhagavadbhiḥ bhāṣitam bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate tat sarvam śrotu kāmena udgrahītu kāmena

original: dhārayitukāmena paryavāptukāmena pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena tatra ca tathatvāya pratipattukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: dhārayitu kāmena paryavāptu kāmena pareṣām ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitu kāmena tatra ca tathatvāya pratipattu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatī putra yāḥ diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: andhākāratamisrā lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭāḥ yatremau sūryācandramasāv evaṃ maharddhikāv
analyzed: andha ākāra tamisrāḥ loka āntarikāḥ aghāḥ agha sphuṭāḥ yatra imau sūryācandramasau evam maharddhikau

original: evaṃ maheśākhyāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau na bhāsete na tapato na virocete tāḥ sarvāḥ avabhāsayitukāmena
analyzed: evam maheśākhyau evam mahā anubhāvau na bhāsete na tapataḥ na virocete tāḥ sarvāḥ avabhāsayitu kāmena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
analyzed: evan dakṣiṇasyām diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu

original: dikṣu yā andhākāratamisrās tāḥ sarvā avabhāsayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
analyzed: dikṣu yāḥ andhākāra tamisrāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ avabhāsayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatī putra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ

original: yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdas tatra lokadhātuṣu tān sarvasatvān
analyzed: yatra na buddha śabdaḥ na dharma śabdaḥ na saṃgha śabdaḥ tatra lokadhātuṣu tān sarva satvān

original: buddhadharmasaṃghaśabdāṃc chrāvayitukāmena samyagdṛṣṭau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena
analyzed: buddha dharma saṃgha śabdān śrāvayitu kāmena samyagdṛṣṭau pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena bodhisatvena

original: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu : //
analyzed: evam diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra ye diśi dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt

original: upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv
analyzed: upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: andhāḥ satvās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanti badhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdāṃ
analyzed: andhāḥ satvāḥ te mama anubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanti badhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān

original: śroṣyanti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma /
analyzed: śroṣyanti unmattāḥ smṛtim pratilabhante sma

original: nagnāś cīvarāṇi pratilapsyante /
analyzed: nagnāḥ cīvarāṇi pratilapsyante

original: kṣudhitapipāsitā annapānaṃ pratilapsyante /
analyzed: kṣudhita pipāsitāḥ anna pānam pratilapsyante

original: glānā vyādhibhyaḥ parimucyante /
analyzed: glānāḥ vyādhibhyaḥ parimucyante

original: bandhanāvarodhagatā yathākāmaṃgatā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: bandhana avarodha gatāḥ yathākāmaṃgatāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: mama riddhyā mamānubhāveneti /
analyzed: mama riddhyā mama anubhāvena iti

original: tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: kim iti (LPG 15r) ye tatra samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
analyzed: kim iti lpg  ye tatra samantāt daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣv akṣaṇāpāyagatāḥ satvā nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā te
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu akṣaṇa apāya gatāḥ satvāḥ nairayikāḥ vā tairyagyonikāḥ vā yāmalaukikāḥ vā te

original: mamānubhāvena tataś cyavitvā mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante /
analyzed: mama anubhāvena tatas cyavitvā mānuṣyakam ātma bhāvam pratilapsyante

original: sarvāṃś ca tān satvāṃc chīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane
analyzed: sarvān ca tān satvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena samādhau prajñāyām vimuktau vimukti jñāna darśane

original: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena srotaāpatti phale sakṛdāgāmi phale anāgāmi phale arhatve pratyeka bodhau

original: yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
analyzed: yāvat anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena tathāgateryāpathaṃ śikṣitukāmena tathāgatacaryācāritraviśuddhiṃ tathāgatasya
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena tathāgata īryāpatham śikṣitu kāmena tathāgata caryā cāritra viśuddhim tathāgatasya

original: jñānapūrvaṃgamakāyakarmavakkarmamanaskarmapariśuddhiṃ śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: jñāna pūrvaṃgama kāya karma vakkarma manaḥkarma pariśuddhim śikṣitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām carata evam

original: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam avalokayeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ mahāsiṃhavijṛṃbhitena
analyzed: vyupaparīkṣitavyam kim iti aham nāgāvalokitam avalokayeyam kim iti aham mahā siṃha vijṛṃbhitena

original: vijṛmbheyaṃ kim ity aham amoghavikrāmitayā vikrāmeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ caturaṃgulamātreṇa
analyzed: vijṛmbheyam kim iti aham amogha vikrāmitayā vikrāmeyam kim iti aham catur aṃgula mātreṇa

original: mahāpṛthivīm aspṛśan gaccheyaṃ /
analyzed: mahā pṛthivīm a spṛśan gaccheyam

original: kim ity ahaṃ sahasrapatreṣu pādmeṣu pādatalau nikṣipan gaccheyaṃ pādatalasanniśṛtān prāṇino aviheṭhayan* kim ity ahaṃ sahasrāracakratalābhyāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ vicitrayan gaccheyam //
analyzed: kim iti aham sahasra patreṣu pādmeṣu pāda talau nikṣipan gaccheyam pāda tala sanniśṛtān prāṇinaḥ a viheṭhayan kim iti aham sahasra ara cakra talābhyām mahā pṛthivīm vicitrayan gaccheyam

original: kim ity ahaṃ samantāc cakrapramāṇamātraṃ mahāpṛthivyāḥ parivartayeyaṃ caṃkrame caṃkramyeya kim ity ahaṃ sarvāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anucaṃkramyamāṇaḥ pṛthivīrajasā nānulipyeya /
analyzed: kim iti aham samantāt cakra pramāṇa mātram mahā pṛthivyāḥ parivartayeyam caṃkrame caṃkramyeya kim iti aham sarvām mahā pṛthivīm anucaṃkramyamāṇaḥ pṛthivī rajasā na anulipyeya

original: kim iti me ekaṃ vā yojanaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā /
analyzed: kim iti me ekam vā yojanam dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā

original: paṃca vā daśa vā viṃśatir vā tṛṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā paṃcāśad vā yojanaśataṃ vā /
analyzed: paṃca vā daśa vā viṃśatiḥ vā tṛṃśat vā catvāriṃśat vā paṃcāśat vā yojana śatam vā

original: yāvad yojanasahasraṃ vā /
analyzed: yāvat yojana sahasram vā

original: yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā /
analyzed: yojana śata sahasram vā

original: aprameyāṇi vā asaṃkhyeyāni vā acintyāni vā /
analyzed: aprameyāṇi vā asaṃkhyeyāni vā acintyāni vā

original: atulyāni (LPG 15v) vā /
analyzed: atulyāni vā

original: anaṃtāni vā aparyantāni vā /
analyzed: anantāni vā aparyantāni vā

original: amāpyāni vā buddhakṣetrāṇy anuvicarato 'nucaṃkramyamāṇasya na kāyaklame na cittam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: a māpyāni vā buddhakṣetrāṇi anuvicarataḥ nucaṃkramyamāṇasya na kāya klame na cittam iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: kim ity aham adhastāt kramatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrabhyāṃ raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
analyzed: kim iti aham adhastāt krama talayoḥ sahasra ārābhyām cakrabhyām raśmi koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi

original: pramuṃcan* sarvākṣaṇāpāyaduḥkhāni praśamayya sarvasatvān sukhitān kuryām iti bodhisatvena
analyzed: pramuṃcan sarva akṣaṇa apāya duḥkhāni praśamayya sarva satvān sukhitān kuryām iti bodhisatvena

original: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām carata evam

original: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ caturmahārājakāyikair devair yāvad akaniṣṭhair anekair
analyzed: vyupaparīkṣitavyam kim iti aham catur mahārājakāyikaiḥ devaiḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhaiḥ anekaiḥ

original: devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkrameyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: deva koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkrameyam iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam vyupaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim iti me bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣīdataś cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā duṣyasaṃstaraṃ kuryur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
analyzed: kim iti me bodhivṛkṣa mūle niṣīdataḥ cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat agha niṣṭhāḥ devāḥ duṣya saṃstaram kuryuḥ iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām carata evam

original: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato
analyzed: vyupaparīkṣitavyam kim iti me nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchataḥ

original: niṣaṇṇasya śayānasya sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheta /
analyzed: niṣaṇṇasya śayānasya sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ vajra mayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheta

original: tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: tena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām carata evam

original: upaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva divase 'bhiniṣkrameyaṃ tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ
analyzed: upaparīkṣitavyam kim iti aham yatra eva divase bhiniṣkrameyam tatra eva divase

original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tatraiva divase dharmacakraṃ pravartayeyaṃ pravartayataś
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam tatra eva divase dharmacakram pravartayeyam pravartayataḥ

original: cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyet*
analyzed: ca aprameya asaṃkhyeyānām satvānām virajaḥ vigata malam dharmeṣu dharma cakṣuḥ viśudhyet

original: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃm anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimucyeran* aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ
analyzed: aprameya asaṃkhyeyānām an upādāya āsravebhyaḥ cittāni vimucyeran aprameya asaṃkhyeyāḥ

original: satvā 'vaivartikā (LPG 16r)
analyzed: satvā vaivartikā

original: bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau tena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām carata evam

original: cittam utpādayitavyam* kim ity me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyaḥ
analyzed: cittam utpādayitavyam kim iti me nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya aprameya asaṃkhyeyaḥ

original: śrāvakasaṃgho bhavet* ekadharmadeśanayāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā ekāsanikā arhanto bhaveyur
analyzed: śrāvaka saṃghaḥ bhavet eka dharma deśanayā aprameya asaṃkhyeyāḥ eka āsanikāḥ arhantaḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: bodhisatvā mahāsatvā sarve avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvā sarve a vaivartikāḥ bhaveyuḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇo bodhisatvasaṃgho bhavet* amitaṃ cāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhavet* amitā
analyzed: aprameya asaṃkhyeya aparimāṇaḥ bodhisatva saṃghaḥ bhavet amitam ca āyuṣpramāṇam bhavet amitā

original: prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāmitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: prabhā saṃpad bhavet iti prajñāpāmitāyām śikṣitavyam kim iti me nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohaśabdo 'pi na bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre rāga dveṣa moha śabdaḥ na bhavet iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: sarvasatvā evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu brahmacaryaṃ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣu /
analyzed: sarva satvāḥ evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatāḥ bhaveyuḥ sādhu dānam sādhu damaḥ sādhu brahmacaryam sādhu avihiṃsā sarva prāṇi bhūteṣu

original: kiṃ me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānaśabdo 'pi na bhavet tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: kim me parinirvṛtasya saddharma antardhāna śabdaḥ na bhavet tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: kim iti me saha śravaṇamātreṇa nāmadheyasya gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvā niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: kim iti me saha śravaṇa mātreṇa nāmadheyasya gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāḥ niyatāḥ bhaveyuḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: tena śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
analyzed: tena śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: yasmiṃc chāradvatīputra samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati /
analyzed: yasmin śāradvatīputra samaye bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān guṇān utpādayati

original: tasmin samaye āttamanaskā bhavaṃti catvāro mahārājā vayam atra catvāri pātrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmo yāni paurvakair mahārājaiḥ paurvakeṣu tathāgateṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
analyzed: tasmin samaye ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti catvāraḥ mahā rājāḥ vayam atra catvāri pātrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ yāni paurvakaiḥ mahā rājaiḥ paurvakeṣu tathāgateṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni

original: āttamanaskā bhavanti trāyastriṃśā devā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ āttamanaskā bhavanti paranirmitavaśavartino devā vayam asyopasthānaparicaryāṃ (LPG 16v)
analyzed: ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti trāyastriṃśāḥ devāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ devāḥ vayam asya upasthāna paricaryām

original: kariṣyāma evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyaṃte divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante / //
analyzed: kariṣyāmaḥ evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyaṃte divyāḥ kāyāḥ abhivardhiṣyante  /

original: āttamanaskā bhavanti brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā śubhakṛtsnā bṛhatphalā avṛhā atapāḥ
analyzed: ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ bṛhatphalāḥ avṛhāḥ atapāḥ

original: sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā āttamanaskā bhavanti aghaniṣṭhā devā vayam enam adhyeṣiṣyāmahe
analyzed: sudṛśāḥ su darśanāḥ ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti agha niṣṭhāḥ devāḥ vayam enam adhyeṣiṣyāmahe

original: dharmacakrapravartanāya /
analyzed: dharmacakra pravartanāya

original: yasmin samaye śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate
analyzed: yasmin samaye śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran vivardhate

original: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir āttamanaskās tasmin* samaye bhavanti kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ ātta manaskāḥ tasmin samaye bhavanti kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ

original: ca vayam asya mahāsatvasya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo //
analyzed: ca vayam asya mahāsatvasya mātā pitarau

original: bhrātṛbhaginībhāryāputraduhitṛmitrāmātyajñātisahāyasāṃmodā bhaviṣyāma /
analyzed: bhrātṛ bhaginī bhāryā putra duhitṛ mitra amātya jñāti sahāya sāṃmodāḥ bhaviṣyāma

original: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā bodhisatvasyāmaithunasaṃyogaprasthānatāyai
analyzed: ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti catvāraḥ mahārājāḥ yāvat agha niṣṭhāḥ devāḥ bodhisatvasya a maithuna saṃyoga prasthāna tāyai

original: sa punar brahmacārī bhavati satvānāṃ bodhiniyojanatāyai na saṃyojanīyair dharmaiḥ
analyzed: sa punar brahmacārī bhavati satvānām bodhi niyojana tāyai na saṃyojanīyaiḥ dharmaiḥ

original: saṃyujyate sa evaṃ praṇidadhāti /
analyzed: saṃyujyate saḥ evam praṇidadhāti

original: prathamacittotpādaṃ mayopādāya brahmacāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ nābrahmacāriṇā //
analyzed: prathama citta utpādam mayā upādāya brahmacāriṇā bhavitavyam na abrahmacāriṇā

original: tat kasya hetoḥ kāmāṃ khalu punaḥ pratiṣevamāṇasya brahmalokopapattaye-r-antarāyo bhavati /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ kāmām khalu punar pratiṣevamāṇasya brahma loka upapattayeḥ antarāyaḥ bhavati

original: kaḥ punar vādo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti / //
analyzed: kaḥ punar vādaḥ nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ iti

original: tasmāt tarhi bodhisatvena mahāsatvena brahmacāriṇaivābhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā : //
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi bodhisatvena mahāsatvena brahmacāriṇā eva abhiniṣkramya anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃboddhavyā na a brahmacāriṇā

original: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kiṃ punar bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāvaśyaṃ bhāryaputraduhitṛbhir bhavitavyam* bhagavān āha /
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāradvatī putraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat kim punar bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya avaśyam bhārya putra duhitṛbhiḥ bhavitavyam bhagavān āha

original: keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhir bhavitavyam*
analyzed: keṣāṃcid śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām avaśyam mātā pitṛbhiḥ bhavitavyam

original: na bhāryāputraduhitṛbhiḥ keṣāṃcid avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhāryāputraduhitribhir bhavitavyam*
analyzed: na bhāryā putra duhitṛbhiḥ keṣāṃcid avaśyam mātā pitṛ bhāryā putra duhitribhiḥ bhavitavyam

original: keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya brahmacaryaṃsamādānaṃ bhavati (LPG 17r)
analyzed: keṣāṃcid śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām prathama citta utpādam upādāya brahmacaryam samādānam bhavati

original: te nityaṃ kumārabhūtā eva yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante kecit
analyzed: te nityam kumāra bhūtāḥ eva yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante kecid

original: punaḥ bodhisatvā mahāsatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipākāya paṃca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjyānuttarāṃ
analyzed: punar bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvāḥ upāya kauśalyena satva paripākāya paṃca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjya anuttarām

original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante /
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

original: kecit punaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāpratilabdhā apagatakāmakleśās te satvaparipākāya kāmaguṇaparibhogaṃ cotpādayanti na ca paribhuṃjante / //
analyzed: kecid punar śāradvatīputra bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvāḥ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pratilabdhāḥ apagata kāma kleśāḥ te satva paripākāya kāma guṇa paribhogam ca utpādayanti na ca paribhuṃjante  /

original: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā suśikṣito māyāvidyāsamyogajñāne
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma śāradvatī putra dakṣaḥ māyākāraḥ māyākāra antevāsī vā su śikṣitaḥ māyā vidyā samyoga jñāne

original: sa paṃca kāmaguṇān abhinirmāya taiḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ramamāṇaṃ krīḍantaṃ paricārayaṃtam
analyzed: sa paṃca kāmaguṇān abhinirmāya taiḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ ramamāṇam krīḍantam paricārayaṃtam

original: ātmānam upadarśayet* tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu tena māyākāreṇa vā māyākārāntevāsinā
analyzed: ātmānam upadarśayet tat kim manyase śāradvatī putra api nu tena māyākāreṇa vā māyākāra antevāsinā

original: vā paṃca kāmāmaguṇāḥ paribhuktā bhaveyur āha /
analyzed: vā paṃca kāma āma guṇāḥ paribhuktāḥ bhaveyuḥ āha

original: no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha /
analyzed: no hi idam bhagavan bhagavān āha

original: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā mahāyānamāyāsuśikṣitā māyopamadharmatāvihārapratilabdhāḥ
analyzed: evam eva śāradvatī putra bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvāḥ mahāyāna māyā su śikṣitāḥ māyā upama dharmatā vihāra pratilabdhāḥ

original: sarvakleśavigatā vineyasatvaparipākāya mahākaruṇāvaśena kāmaguṇabhogaṃ copadarśayanti
analyzed: sarva kleśa vigatāḥ vineya satva paripākāya mahā karuṇā vaśena kāma guṇa bhogam ca upadarśayanti

original: na ca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjyante /
analyzed: na ca kāma guṇān paribhuṃjyante

original: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti na lipyaṃte anena paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ kāmānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣante /
analyzed: na ca taiḥ sārdham saṃvasanti na lipyaṃte anena paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvāḥ kāmānām avarṇam bhāṣante

original: ādīptāḥ kāmā jugupsitāḥ kāmā vadhakāḥ kāmāḥ pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ pratyamitrāḥ kāmāḥ
analyzed: ādīptāḥ kāmāḥ jugupsitāḥ kāmāḥ vadhakāḥ kāmāḥ pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ pratyamitrāḥ kāmāḥ

original: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ satvānāṃ paṃcabhyaḥ kāmaguṇebhyo vivecanārthaṃ
analyzed: evam hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvāḥ satvānām paṃcabhyaḥ kāmaguṇebhyaḥ vivecana artham

original: vicchandanārthaṃ paṃca kāmaguṇān upadarśayaṃti /
analyzed: vicchandana artham paṃca kāmaguṇān upadarśayaṃti

original: na ca tair mādyanti na pramādyanti /
analyzed: na ca taiḥ mādyanti na pramādyanti

original: na kāmahetor na kāmanidānaṃ (LPG 17v)
analyzed: na kāma hetoḥ na kāma nidānam

original: pāpaṃ karmādhyavasyanti / //
analyzed: pāpam karma adhyavasyanti

original: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatiputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam* bhagavān āha /
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāradvati putraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat katham punar bhagavan bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyām caritavyam bhagavān āha

original: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatva iti na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran bodhisatvaḥ iti na samanupaśyati

original: bodhisatvanāmāpi na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: bodhisatva nāma api na samanupaśyati

original: bodhisatvacaryām api na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: bodhisatva caryām api na samanupaśyati

original: prajñāpāramiteti na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā iti na samanupaśyati

original: prajñāpāramitānāmāpi na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāḥ āma api na samanupaśyati

original: caratīti na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: carati iti na samanupaśyati

original: na caratīti na samanupaśyati
analyzed: na carati iti na samanupaśyati

original: / rūpam api na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: rūpam api na samanupaśyati

original: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: vedanām saṃjñām saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa bodhisatvo nāmasvabhāvena śunyaḥ na śunyatayā rūpaṃ śunyaṃ
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa bodhisatvaḥ nāma svabhāvena śunyaḥ na śunya tayā rūpam śunyam

original: na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā na śunyatayā vijñānaṃ śunyam* nānyatra rūpāc chunyatā nānyatra
analyzed: na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ na śunya tayā vijñānam śunyam na anyatra rūpāt śunya tā na anyatra

original: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānāc chunyatā /
analyzed: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ na anyatra vijñānāt śunya tā

original: śunyataiva rūpaṃ śunyataiva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ śunyataiva vijñānaṃ tat kasya
analyzed: śunya tā eva rūpam śunya tā eva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ śunya tā eva vijñānam tat kasya

original: hetoḥ tathā hi nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhiḥ nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatvaḥ
analyzed: hetoḥ tathā hi nāma mātram idam yat uta bodhiḥ nāma mātram idam yat uta bodhisatvaḥ

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta cchunyatā /
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta chunyatā

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ /
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam

original: tathā hi māyopamaṃ rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ māyā ca nāmamātraṃ na deśasthā na pradeśasthā :
analyzed: tathā hi māyā upamam rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ māyā upamam vijñānam māyā ca nāma mātram na deśa sthā na pradeśa sthā

original: asad abhūtaṃ vitathasamaṃ māyādarśanaṃ svabhāvarahitaṃ asvabhāvaś cānutpādaḥ anirodaḥ
analyzed: asat abhūtam vitatha samam māyā darśanam svabhāva rahitam asvabhāvaḥ ca anutpādaḥ anirodaḥ

original: na hānir na vṛddhiḥ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utpādaṃ na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na hāniḥ na vṛddhiḥ na saṃkleśaḥ na vyavadānam evam caran bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ utpādam na samanupaśyati

original: nirodhaṃ na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: nirodham na samanupaśyati

original: sthānaṃ na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: sthānam na samanupaśyati

original: hāniṃ na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: hānim na samanupaśyati

original: (LPG 18r) vṛddhiṃ na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: vṛddhim na samanupaśyati

original: saṃkleśan na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: saṃkleśan na samanupaśyati

original: vyavadānan na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: vyavadānat na samanupaśyati

original: rūpan na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: rūpan na samanupaśyati

original: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: vedanām saṃjñām saṃskārān vijñānam na samanupaśyati

original: bodhir iti bodhisatva iti yad ucyate tad api na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: bodhiḥ iti bodhisatvaḥ iti yat ucyate tat api na samanupaśyati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ kṛtriman nāma pratipratidharman te kalpitā āgantukena nāmadheyenābhūtaparikalpitena vyavahṛyante //
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ kṛtrimat nāma prati pratidharman te kalpitāḥ āgantukena nāmadheyena a bhūta parikalpitena vyavahṛyante

original: vyavahārāc cābhiniviśyante /
analyzed: vyavahārāt ca abhiniviśyante

original: tad bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na manyate /
analyzed: tat bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran sarva dharmān na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan na manyate

original: nābhiniviśate / //
analyzed: na abhiniviśate

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ vyupaparīkṣate /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran evam vyupaparīkṣate

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatva iti nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhir iti /
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta bodhisatvaḥ iti nāma mātram idam yat uta bodhiḥ iti

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddha iti /
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta buddhaḥ iti

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramiteti /
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta prajñāpāramitā iti

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti /
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta prajñāpāramitāyām carati iti

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpam iti /
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta rūpam iti

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam iti /
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam iti

original: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ātmātmeti vyavahṛyate sa ca parigaveṣyamāṇo nopalabhyate /
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma śāradvatīputraḥ ātmā ātmā iti vyavahṛyate sa ca parigaveṣyamāṇaḥ na upalabhyate

original: evaṃ satvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārakaḥ kārāpako vedako vedayitṛkaḥ
analyzed: evam satvaḥ jīvaḥ poṣaḥ pudgalaḥ manujaḥ mānavaḥ kārakaḥ kārāpakaḥ vedakaḥ vedayitṛkaḥ

original: utthāpakaḥ samutthāpako jānakaḥ paśyakaḥ sparśako vijānakaḥ sarva ete yathābhūtaṃ
analyzed: utthāpakaḥ samutthāpakaḥ jānakaḥ paśyakaḥ sparśakaḥ vijānakaḥ sarve ete yathābhūtam

original: parigaveṣyamāṇāḥ sarveṇa sarvan nopalabhyante /
analyzed: parigaveṣyamāṇāḥ sarveṇa sarvat na upalabhyante

original: anupalaṃbhaśunyatām upādāya /
analyzed: anupalaṃbha śunya tām upādāya

original: yāvad eva nāmasaṃketena vyavahriyante / //
analyzed: yāvat eva nāma saṃketena vyavahriyante

original: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatvan na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: evam eva bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran bodhisatvan na samanupaśyati

original: bodhin na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: bodhin na samanupaśyati

original: buddhan na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: buddhat na samanupaśyati

original: prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām na samanupaśyati

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām carati iti na samanupaśyati

original: rūpan na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: rūpan na samanupaśyati

original: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānan na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: vedanām saṃjñām saṃskārān vijñānat na samanupaśyati

original: yena nāmnā vyavahṛyeta /
analyzed: yena nāmnā vyavahṛyeta

original: tad api nāmaṃ na samanupaśyaty evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: tat api nāmam na samanupaśyati evam caran bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām

original: tathāgataprajñāṃ sthāpayitvā sarvās tadanyāḥ prajñā yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
analyzed: tathāgata prajñām sthāpayitvā sarvāḥ tad anyāḥ prajñāḥ yāvat sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām

original: prajñā abhibhavaty anupalambhaśunyatām (LPG 18v) upādāya /
analyzed: prajñāḥ abhibhavati anupalambha śunya tā upādā

original: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa tad api na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa tat api na samanupaśyati

original: yenābhiniviśeta evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputrāyaṃ jaṃbudvīpaḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair
analyzed: yena abhiniviśeta evam caran śāradvatīputra ayam jaṃbudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaḥ bhavet śāradvatīputra maudgalyāyana sadṛśaiḥ

original: bhikṣubhiḥ tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravaṇaṃ vā śālivanaṃ
analyzed: bhikṣubhiḥ tat yathā api nāma naḍa vanam vā veṇu vanam vā ikṣu vanam vā śaravaṇam vā śāli vanam

original: vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
analyzed: vā tila vanam vā teṣām yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ

original: prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti /
analyzed: prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāt na upaiti

original: sahasratamīm api /
analyzed: sahasratamīm api

original: śatasahasratamīm api /
analyzed: śata sahasratamīm api

original: koṭīśatasahasratamīm api /
analyzed: koṭī śata sahasratamīm api

original: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate /
analyzed: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api upaniśām api na kṣamate

original: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya yā prajñā sā sarvasatvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇārthāya pratyupasthitā //
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya yā prajñā sā sarva satvānām parinirvāpaṇa arthāya pratyupasthitā

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yā ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā abhibhūya tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ yā eka divasa paribhāvitā prajñā sā sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām prajñāḥ abhibhūya tiṣṭhati

original: tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaḥ śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaḥ śāradvatīputra maudgalyāyana sadṛśaiḥ

original: bhikṣubhiḥ sacec chāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇo bhaved
analyzed: bhikṣubhiḥ saced śāradvatīputra tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇaḥ bhavet

original: yuṣmādṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: yuṣmādṛśaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ teṣām yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām

original: carataḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate //
analyzed: carataḥ śatatamīm api kalān nā upaiti yāvat upa niśām api na kṣamate

original: tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sacec chāradvatīputra pūrvasyān
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ saced śāradvatīputra

original: diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair
analyzed: diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇāḥ bhaveyuḥ śāradvatīputra maudgalyāyana sadṛśaiḥ

original: bhikṣubhiḥ evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād
analyzed: bhikṣubhiḥ evan dakṣiṇasyām diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt

original: daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ
analyzed: daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitāyāḥ (LPG 19r)
analyzed: teṣām yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ eka divasa paribhāvitāyāḥ

original: prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate /
analyzed: prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nā upaiti yāvat upaniśām api na kṣamate

original: śāradvatīputra āha /
analyzed: śāradvatīputraḥ āha

original: yeyaṃ bhagavaṃc chrāvakāṇāṃ prajñā srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāminaḥ arhataḥ
analyzed: yā iyam bhagavan śrāvakāṇām prajñā srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāminaḥ arhataḥ

original: yā ca pratyekabuddhasya bodhisatvasya tathāgatasya cārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prajñā
analyzed: yā ca pratyekabuddhasya bodhisatvasya tathāgatasya ca arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prajñā

original: sarvās tāḥ prajñā abhedaḥ śunyatā viviktāḥ anutpādaprakṛtikāḥ svabhāvaśunyā na ca
analyzed: sarvāḥ tāḥ prajñāḥ abhedaḥ śunyatā viviktāḥ anutpāda prakṛtikāḥ svabhāva śunyāḥ na ca

original: bhagavann abhedasya viviktasyānutpādasya svabhāvaśunyasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate /
analyzed: bhagavan abhedasya viviktasya anutpādasya svabhāva śunyasya viśeṣaḥ vā nānākaraṇam vā upalabhyate

original: tat kathaṃ bhagavan yeyaṃ bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati / //
analyzed: tat katham bhagavan yā iyam bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya eka divasa paribhāvitā prajñā sā sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām prajñām abhibhavati  /

original: bhagavān āha /
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: tat kim manyase śāradvatīputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām

original: carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā pratyupasthitā mayā mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caratā
analyzed: carataḥ eka divasa paribhāvitā prajñā pratyupasthitā mayā mārga ākāra jña tāyām caratā

original: sarvasatvānām arthaṃ kurvatā sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā
analyzed: sarva satvānām artham kurvatā sarva ākāraiḥ sarva dharmān abhisaṃbudhya sarva satvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā

original: api nu tena kṛtyena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pratyupasthitā /
analyzed: api nu tena kṛtyena sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām pratyupasthitā

original: āha /
analyzed: āha

original: no hīdaṃ bhagavan* bhagavān āha /
analyzed: no hi idam bhagavan bhagavān āha

original: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavaty asmābhir
analyzed: tat kim manyase śāradvatī putra api nu sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām evam bhavati asmābhiḥ

original: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyā āha /
analyzed: anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarva satvāḥ an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ āha

original: no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha /
analyzed: no hi idam bhagavan bhagavān āha

original: tad anenāpi te śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam* yeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
analyzed: tat anena api te śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa evam veditavyam yā iyam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām

original: prajñā yā ca bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñā imāṃ prajñām upanidhāyaiṣā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
analyzed: prajñā yā ca bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñā imām prajñām upanidhāya eṣā sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām

original: prajñā śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti /
analyzed: prajñā śatatamīm api kalāt na upaiti

original: yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate /
analyzed: yāvat upaniśām api na kṣamate

original: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati vayaṃ
analyzed: tat kim manyase śāradvatīputra api nu sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām evam bhavati vayam

original: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
analyzed: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetram pariśodhya daśa tathāgata balāni

original: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
analyzed: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān

original: paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim (LPG 19v)
analyzed: paripūray anuttara samyaksambodhi

original: abhisaṃbuddhyāparimāṇān aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti āha /
analyzed: abhisaṃbuddhya aparimāṇān aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmaḥ iti āha

original: no hīdaṃ bhagavan* bhagavān āha /
analyzed: no hi idam bhagavan bhagavān āha

original: bodhisatvasya punaḥ śāradvatīputraivaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: bodhisatvasya punar śāradvatīputra evam bhavati

original: mayā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
analyzed: mayā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetram pariśodhya daśa tathāgata balāni

original: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
analyzed: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān

original: paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ satvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ //
analyzed: paripūrya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameya asaṃkhyeya aparimāṇāḥ satvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra khadyotakasya prāṇikajātasya naivaṃ bhavaty aham ābhayā
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma śāradvatīputra khadyotakasya prāṇika jātasya na evam bhavati aham ābhayā

original: jambudvīpam avabhāsayeyaṃ mamābhayā jambudvīpaḥ sphuṭo bhavet* evam eva śāradvatīputra
analyzed: jambudvīpam avabhāsayeyam mama ābhayā jambudvīpaḥ sphuṭaḥ bhavet evam eva śāradvatīputra

original: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā yāvad
analyzed: sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām na evam bhavati vayam ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā yāvat

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇān
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa āveṇikām buddha dharmān paripūrya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya aprameya asaṃkhyeya aparimāṇān

original: satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmaḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra sūryamaṇḍalam udāgacchat sarvajaṃbūdvīpam avabhāsena spharati /
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma śāradvatīputra sūrya maṇḍalam udāgacchat sarva jaṃbūdvīpam avabhāsena spharati

original: sarvajambudvīpam avabhāsena sphuṭīkaroti evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
analyzed: sarva jambudvīpam avabhāsena sphuṭīkaroti evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ

original: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
analyzed: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran satvān paripācya buddhakṣetram pariśodhya daśa tathāgata balāni

original: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
analyzed: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān

original: paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇān* satvān parinirvāpayati /
analyzed: paripūrya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya aprameya asaṃkhyeya aparimāṇān satvān parinirvāpayati

original: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramyāvaivartikabhūmīm anuprāpnoti /
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāradvatī putraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat katham bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmī atikramya a vaivartika bhūmīm anuprāpnoti

original: bodhisatvamārgaṃ ca pariśodhayati / //
analyzed: bodhisatva mārgam ca pariśodhayati

original: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat* iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāradvatīputram etat avocat iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ

original: mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃc chunyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu (LPG 20r)
analyzed: mahāsatvaḥ prathama citta utpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran śunyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu

original: dharmeṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramya buddhabhūmim anuprāpnoti / //
analyzed: dharmeṣu sthitvā śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmī atikramya buddha bhūmim anuprāpnoti

original: śāradvatīputra āha /
analyzed: śāradvatīputraḥ āha

original: katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati /
analyzed: katamasyām bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām dakṣiṇīyaḥ bhavati

original: bhagavān āha /
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: prathamacittotpādaṃ śāradvatīputropādāya bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran
analyzed: prathama citta utpādam śāradvatīputra upādāya bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran

original: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaḥ atrāntarād bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām
analyzed: yāvat bodhimaṇḍa niṣaṇṇaḥ atra antarāt bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām

original: agro vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya
analyzed: agraḥ vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvam mahāsatvam āgamya

original: sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: sarveṣām kuśalānām dharmāṇām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ paṃcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṃgasamanvāgatasya
analyzed: yat uta daśānām kuśalānām karma pathānām paṃcānām śikṣā padānām aṣṭāṃga samanvāgatasya

original: poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ paṃcānām
analyzed: poṣadhasya caturṇām dhyānānām caturṇām apramāṇānām catasṛṇām ārūpya samāpattīnām paṃcānām

original: abhijñānāṃ ṣaṇṇām anusmṛtīnāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ
analyzed: abhijñānām ṣaṇṇām anusmṛtīnām caturṇām smṛti upasthānānām caturṇām samyakprahāṇānām

original: caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ paṃcānām indriyāṇāṃ paṃcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṃgānām
analyzed: caturṇām ṛddhipādānām paṃcānām indriyāṇām paṃcānām balānām saptānām bodhyaṃgānām

original: āryāṣṭāṃgasya mārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: ārya aṣṭāṃgasya mārgasya loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
analyzed: daśānām tathāgata balānām

original: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: caturṇām vaiśāradyānām catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: eṣām kuśalānām dharmāṇām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvāt* kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni prajñāyante /
analyzed: eṣām kuśalānām dharmāṇām loke prādurbhāvāt kṣatriya mahāsāla kulāni prajñāyante

original: brāhmaṇamahāsālakulāni śreṣṭhigṛhapatimahāsālakulāni prajñāyante /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa mahā sāla kulāni śreṣṭhi gṛhapati mahā sāla kulāni prajñāyante

original: cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante
analyzed: cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat agha niṣṭhāḥ devāḥ prajñāyante

original: yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante /
analyzed: yāvat na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanāḥ devāḥ prajñāyante

original: srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisatvās tathāgatā 'rhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante / //
analyzed: srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāminaḥ rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ bodhisatvāḥ tathāgatāḥ rhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ loke prajñāyante  /

original: āha /
analyzed: āha

original: tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati bhagavān āha /
analyzed: tat kim punar bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ dakṣiṇām śodhayati bhagavān āha

original: (LPG 20v) paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati /
analyzed: paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ dakṣiṇām śodhayati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ atyantapariśuddhā śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dakṣiṇā /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ atyanta pariśuddhā śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dakṣiṇā

original: tathā hi dāyakaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kasya dāyakaḥ anekeṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
analyzed: tathā hi dāyakaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ kasya dāyakaḥ anekeṣām kuśalānām dharmāṇām yat uta daśānām kuśalānām karma pathānām yāvat aṣṭādaśa āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām

original: āha /
analyzed: āha

original: kathaṃ yujyamāno bhagavan bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti veditavyaḥ bhagavān āha /
analyzed: katham yujyamānaḥ bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti veditavyaḥ bhagavān āha

original: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo rūpaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ vedanāśunyatāyāṃ saṃjñāśunyatāyāṃ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ vijñānaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ rūpa śunyatāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ vedanā śunyatāyām saṃjñā śunyatāyām saṃskāra śunyatāyām vijñāna śunyatāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ cakṣuḥśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam cakṣuḥ śunya tāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ evam śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ śunya tāyām

original: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta
analyzed: yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ evam rūpa śabda gandha rasa sparśa dharma śunyatāyām yuktaḥ yukta

original: iti vaktavyaḥ cakṣurdhātuśunyatāyāṃ rūpadhātuśunyatāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: iti vaktavyaḥ cakṣuḥ dhātu śunya tāyām rūpa dhātu śunya tāyām cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātu śunya tāyām

original: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotradhātuśunyatāyāṃ śabdadhātuśunyatāyāṃ śrotravijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ evam śrotra dhātu śunya tāyām śabda dhātu śunya tāyām śrotra vijñāna dhātu śunya tāyām

original: ghrāṇadhātuśunyatāyāṃ gandhadhātuśunyatāyāṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ jihvādhātuśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: ghrāṇa dhātu śunya tāyām gandha dhātu śunya tāyām ghrāṇa vijñāna dhātu śunya tāyām jihvā dhātu śunya tāyām

original: rasadhātuśunyatāyāṃ jihvāvijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ kāyadhātuśunyatāyāṃ sparśadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: rasa dhātu śunya tāyām jihvā vijñāna dhātu śunya tāyām kāya dhātu śunya tāyām sparśa dhātu śunya tāyām

original: kāyavijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ manodhātuśunyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuśunyatāyāṃ manovijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: kāya vijñāna dhātu śunya tāyām manaḥ dhātu śunya tāyām dharmadhātu śunya tāyām manaḥ vijñāna dhātu śunya tāyām

original: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ duḥkhaśunyatāyāṃ samudayaśunyatāyāṃ nirodhaśunyatāyāṃ mārgaśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ duḥkha śunyatāyām samudaya śunyatāyām nirodha śunyatāyām mārga śunyatāyām

original: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ skandhaśunyatāyāṃ dhātuśunyatāyāṃ āyatanaśunyatāyāṃ yukto
analyzed: yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ skandha śunya tāyām dhātu śunya tāyām āyatana śunya tāyām yuktaḥ

original: yukta iti vaktavyaḥ avidyāśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ avidyā śunyatāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ saṃskāra śunyatāyām

original: vijñānaśunyatāyāṃ nāmarūpaśunyatāyāṃ (LPG 21r)
analyzed: vijñāna śunya tāyām nāma rūpa śunya tā

original: ṣaḍāyatanaśunyatāyāṃ sparśaśunyatātāyāṃ vedanāśunyatāyāṃ tṛṣṇāśunyatāyām upādānaśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: ṣaṣ āyatana śunya tāyām sparśa śunya tā tāyām vedanā śunya tāyām tṛṣṇā śunya tāyām upādāna śunya tāyām

original: bhavaśunyatāyāṃ jātiśunyatāyāṃ jarāmaraṇaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmaśunyatāyām
analyzed: bhava śunyatāyām jāti śunyatāyām jarā maraṇa śunyatāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ sarva dharma śunyatāyām

original: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: ye kecit saṃjñāgatāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: ye kecid saṃjñā gatāḥ saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtāḥ dharmāḥ sarveṣām dharmāṇām śunyatāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran prakṛti śunya tāyām

original: yukto yukta iti vaktavya evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ evam khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām

original: caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: sa ābhir daśabhiḥ śunyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad yukta iti vā ayukta
analyzed: saḥ ābhiḥ daśabhiḥ śunyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na tāvat yuktaḥ iti vai ayukta

original: iti vā vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: iti vā vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa na rūpam yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñāt na saṃskārān na vijñānam yuktam iti vā a yuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na rūpam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na rūpam utpāda dharmi vā nirodha dharmi vā samanupaśyati

original: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñāt na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpāda dharmi vā nirodha dharmi vā samanupaśyati

original: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na rūpam saṃkleśa dharmi vā vyavadāna dharmi vā samanupaśyati

original: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñām na saṃskārān na vijñānam saṃkleśa dharmi vā vyavadāna dharmi vā samanupaśyati

original: na rūpaṃ vedanayā sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na rūpam vedanayā sārdham samavasarati iti samanupaśyati

original: na vedanā saṃjñayā na saṃjñā saṃskārair na saṃskārā vijñānena sārdhaṃ samavasarantīti samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na vedanā saṃjñayā na saṃjñā saṃskāraiḥ na saṃskārāḥ vijñānena sārdham samavasaranti iti samanupaśyati

original: na vijñānaṃ saṃskāraiḥ sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na vijñānam saṃskāraiḥ sārdham samavasarati iti samanupaśyati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi na sa kaścid dharmaḥ kenacid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasarati na visarati / //
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi na sa kaścid dharmaḥ kenacid dharmeṇa sārdham samavasarati na visarati  /

original: na yujyate na viyujyate prakṛtiśunyatām upādāya /
analyzed: na yujyate na viyujyate prakṛti śunya tām upādāya

original: yā śāradvatīputra rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpaṃ yā vedanāśunyatā na sā vedanā /
analyzed: yā śāradvatīputra rūpa śunya tā na sā rūpam yā vedanā śunya tā na sā vedanā

original: yā saṃjñāśunyatā na sā saṃjñā /
analyzed: yā saṃjñā a śunya tā na sā saṃjñā

original: yā saṃskāraśunyatā na te saṃskārā /
analyzed: yā saṃskāra śunya tā na te saṃskārāḥ

original: yā vijñānaśunyatā na sā vijñānaṃ /
analyzed: yā vijñāna śunya tā na sā vijñānam

original: tathā hi śāradvatīputra yā rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpayati /
analyzed: tathā hi śāradvatīputra yā rūpa śunya tā na sā rūpayati

original: yā vedanāśunyatā na sā (LPG 21v) vedayati /
analyzed: yā vedanā śunya tā na sā lpg vedayati

original: yā saṃjñāśunyatā na sā saṃjānāti /
analyzed: yā saṃjñā śunya tā na sā saṃjānāti

original: yā saṃskāraśunyatā na sābhisaṃskaroti /
analyzed: yā saṃskāra śunya tā na sā abhisaṃskaroti

original: yā vijñānaśunyatā na sā vijānāti /
analyzed: yā vijñāna śunya tā na sā vijānāti

original: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śāradvatīputrānyad rūpam anyā śunyatā nānyā śunyatānyad rūpam* rūpam eva śunyatā śunyataiva rūpam* evaṃ nānyā vedanānyā śunyatā /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śāradvatīputra anyat rūpam anyā śunyatā na anyā śunyatā anyat rūpam rūpam eva śunyatā śunyatā eva rūpam evam na anyā vedanā anyā śunyatā

original: nānyā saṃjñā nānyā śunyatā /
analyzed: na anyā saṃjñā na anyā śunya tā

original: nānye saṃskārā anyā śunyatā /
analyzed: na anye saṃskārāḥ anyā śunyatā

original: nānyad vijñānam anyā śunyatā /
analyzed: na anyat vijñānam anyā śunya tā

original: nānyā śunyatānyad vijñānaṃ /
analyzed: na anyā śunyatā anyat vijñānam

original: vijñānam eva śunyatā śunyataiva vijñānaṃ /
analyzed: vijñānam eva śunya tā śunya tā eva vijñānam

original: yā śāradvatīputra śunyatā na sā utpadyate na nirudhyate /
analyzed: yā śāradvatīputra śunya tā na sā utpadyate na nirudhyate

original: na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate /
analyzed: na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate

original: na hīyate na vardhate /
analyzed: na hīyate na vardhate

original: nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā yā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
analyzed: na atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā yā na utpadyate na nirudhyate

original: na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate /
analyzed: na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate

original: na hīyate na vardhate /
analyzed: na hīyate na vardhate

original: nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā :
analyzed: na atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā

original: na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na cakṣur na śrotraṃ na
analyzed: na tatra rūpam na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam na cakṣuḥ na śrotram na

original: ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā kāyo na manaḥ na rūpaṃ na śabdo na gandho na raso na sparśo na dharmāḥ
analyzed: ghrāṇam na jihvā kāyaḥ na manaḥ na rūpam na śabdaḥ na gandhaḥ na rasaḥ na sparśaḥ na dharmāḥ

original: na tatra skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na tatra cakṣurdhātur na rūpadhātur na cakṣurvijñānadhātur
analyzed: na tatra skandhāḥ na dhātavaḥ na āyatanāni na tatra cakṣuḥ dhātuḥ na rūpa dhātuḥ na cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātuḥ

original: na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ na ghrāṇadhātur na gandhadhātur
analyzed: na śrotra dhātuḥ na śabda dhātuḥ na śrotra vijñāna dhātuḥ na ghrāṇa dhātuḥ na gandha dhātuḥ

original: na ghrāṇavijñānadhātur na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ na kāyadhātur
analyzed: na ghrāṇa vijñāna dhātuḥ na jihvā dhātuḥ na rasa dhātuḥ na jihvā vijñāna dhātuḥ na kāya dhātuḥ

original: na spraṣṭavyadhātur na kāyavijñānadhātur na manodhātur na dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhātur
analyzed: na spraṣṭavya dhātuḥ na kāya vijñāna dhātuḥ na manaḥ dhātuḥ na dharmadhātuḥ na manaḥ vijñāna dhātuḥ

original: na tatrāvidyā nāvidyānirodhaḥ na saṃskārā nna saṃskāranirodhaḥ na vijñānaṃ na vijñānanirodhaḥ
analyzed: na tatra avidyā na avidyā nirodhaḥ na saṃskārāḥ na saṃskāra nirodhaḥ na vijñānam na vijñāna nirodhaḥ

original: na nāmarūpaṃ na nāmarūpanirodhaḥ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ na sparśo na
analyzed: na nāma rūpam na nāma rūpa nirodhaḥ na ṣaṣ āyatanam na ṣaṣ āyatana nirodhaḥ na sparśaḥ na

original: sparśanirodhaḥ na vedanā na vedanānirodhaḥ na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ nopādānaṃ nopādānanirodhaḥ
analyzed: sparśa nirodhaḥ na vedanā na vedanā nirodhaḥ na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇā nirodhaḥ na upādānam na upādāna nirodhaḥ

original: na bhavo na bhavanirodhaḥ na jātir na jātinirodhaḥ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇanirodhaḥ
analyzed: na bhavaḥ na bhava nirodhaḥ na jātiḥ na jāti nirodhaḥ na jarā maraṇam na jarā maraṇa nirodhaḥ

original: na duḥkhaṃ na samudayo na nirodho na mārgaḥ na prāptir nābhisamayaḥ na srotaāpanno
analyzed: na duḥkham na samudayaḥ na nirodhaḥ na mārgaḥ na prāptiḥ na abhisamayaḥ na srotaāpannaḥ

original: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmī (LPG 22r)
analyzed: na srotaāpatti phalam na sakṛdāgāmī

original: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmī nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhan nārhatvam* na pratyekabodhir na
analyzed: na sakṛdāgāmi phalam na anāgāmī na anāgāmi phalam na arhan na arha tvam na pratyeka bodhiḥ na

original: pratyekabuddhaḥ na tatra mārgākārajñatā na bodhisatvaḥ na tatra bodhir na buddhaḥ
analyzed: pratyekabuddhaḥ na tatra mārga ākāra jña tā na bodhisatvaḥ na tatra bodhiḥ na buddhaḥ

original: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti
analyzed: evam khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti

original: vaktavyaḥ sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta
analyzed: vaktavyaḥ saḥ evam prajñāpāramitāyām caran na dāna pāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vā ayukta

original: iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati
analyzed: na śīla pāramitāyām na kṣānti pāramitāyām na vīrya pāramitāyām na dhyāna pāramitāyām na prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vā a yuktaḥ iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na rūpam yuktam iti vā a yuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñāt na saṃskārān na vijñānam yuktam iti vā a yuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na cakṣur yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ yuktam iti vā a yuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyaṃ na mano yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na śrotram na ghrāṇam na jihvām na kāyam na manaḥ yuktam iti vā a yuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na rūpam yuktam iti vā a yuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na śabdaṃ na gandhaṃ na rasaṃ na sparśaṃ na dharmān na cakṣurdhātuṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na śabdam na gandham na rasam na sparśam na dharmān na cakṣuḥ dhātum yuktam iti vā a yuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na rūpadhātuṃ na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ yāvan na manodhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ na manovijñānadhātuṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na rūpa dhātum na cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum yāvat na manaḥ dhātum na dharmadhātum na manaḥ vijñāna dhātum yuktaḥ iti vā a yuktaḥ iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na smṛti upasthāneṣu yuktaḥ iti vā a yuktaḥ iti vā samanupaśyati

original: na samyakprahāṇeṣu na riddhipādeṣu nendriyeṣu na baleṣu na bodhyaṃgeṣu na mārge yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na samyakprahāṇeṣu na riddhipādeṣu na indriyeṣu na baleṣu na bodhyaṃgeṣu na mārge yuktaḥ iti vā a yuktaḥ iti vā samanupaśyati

original: yāvan na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: yāvat na daśasu tathāgata baleṣu na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu na aṣṭādaśasu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu yuktaḥ iti vā a yuktaḥ iti vā samanupaśyati

original: yāvan na sarvajñatāyāṃ na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: yāvat na sarvajña tāyām na sarva ākārajña tāyām yuktaḥ iti vā a yuktaḥ iti vā samanupaśyati

original: anenāpi śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmāyogāviyogatām (LPG 22v) upādāya
analyzed: anena api śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ sarva dharma ayoga aviyoga tām upādāya

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śunyatāṃ śunyatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na śunya tām śunya tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: na śunyatāyogam* nānimittam ānimittena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na śunya tā yogam na animittam ā animittena yojayati na viyojayati

original: nānimittayogam* nāpraṇihitam apraṇihitena yojayati na viyojayati
analyzed: na animitta yogam na apraṇihitam apraṇihitena yojayati na viyojayati

original: / nāpraṇihitayogam /
analyzed: na apraṇihita yogam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śunyatā na yogo na viyogaḥ evam ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ na
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śunya tā na yogaḥ na viyogaḥ evam ānimittam apraṇihitam na

original: yogo na viyogaḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
analyzed: yogaḥ na viyogaḥ evam yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśunyatām avatarati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran dharmāṇām sva lakṣaṇa śunya tām avatarati

original: evam avataran na rūpaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam avataran na rūpam yojayati na viyojayati

original: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñām na saṃskārān na vijñānam yojayati na viyojayati

original: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam pūrva antena yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi pūrva antam eva na samanupaśyati

original: na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam apara antena yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hy aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi apara antam eva na samanupaśyati

original: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati

original: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannair yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārān na vijñānam pūrva anta apara anta pratyutpannaiḥ yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannāny eva na samanupaśyati / //
analyzed: tathā hi pūrva anta apara anta pratyutpannāni eva na samanupaśyati

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na pūrva antam apara antena yojayati na viyojayati

original: nāparāntaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na apara antam pūrva antena yojayati na viyojayati

original: na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntenāparāntena vā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na pratyutpannam pūrva antena apara antena vā yojayati na viyojayati

original: na pūrvāntam aparāntaṃ vā pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na pūrva antam apara antam vā pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati

original: adhvasamatāśunyatām upādāya / //
analyzed: adhva sama tā śunya tām upādāya

original: evaṃ hi yuktaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ (LPG 23r)
analyzed: evam hi yuktaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ yujyate yathā yujyamāno na sarvajñatām atītena yojayati tathā hy atītam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran evam yujyate yathā yujyamānaḥ na sarvajña tām atītena yojayati tathā hi atītam eva na samanupaśyati

original: asamanupaśyan /
analyzed: a samanupaśyan

original: kathaṃ sarvajñatām atītena yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: katham sarvajña tām atītena yojayiṣyati

original: na sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: na sarvajña tām anāgatena yojayiṣyati

original: tathā hy anāgatam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: tathā hi anāgatam eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan katham sarvajña tām anāgatena yojayiṣyati

original: na sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati /
analyzed: na sarvajña tām pratyutpannena yojayati

original: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan katham sarvajña tām pratyutpannena yojayiṣyati

original: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam caran śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na rūpam

original: sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan
analyzed: sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan

original: kathaṃ rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayiṣyati / //
analyzed: katham rūpam sarvajña tayā yojayiṣyati

original: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na vedanām na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati

original: yāvan na cakṣuḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: yāvat na cakṣuḥ sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi cakṣuḥ eva na samanupaśyati

original: evan na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evat na śrotram na ghrāṇam na jihvām na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi mana eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi manaḥ eva na samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na rūpam sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ na śabdagandharasasparśadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na śabda gandha rasa sparśa dharmān sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ na skandhān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na skandhān sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: (LPG 23v) tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati

original: na dhātūn sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na dhātūn sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati

original: nāyatanāni sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na āyatanāni sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hy āyatanāny eva na samanupaśyati / //
analyzed: tathā hi āyatanāni eva na samanupaśyati

original: na cakṣurdhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi cakṣurdhātum eva na samanupaśyati / //
analyzed: tathā hi cakṣuḥ dhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: na rūpadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na rūpadhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: yāvan na manodhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: yāvat na manaḥ dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi manodhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi manaḥ dhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: na dharmadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na dharmadhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: na manovijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi manovijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
